3578.Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
3578.Description: In fifteenth century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

3579.Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
3579.Cast: Tom Hulce, Demi Moore, Tony Jay, Kevin Kline, Paul Kandel, Jason Alexander
3579.Description: Quasi leaves his tower in Notre Dame to help a kind and beautiful gypsy.

3580.Title: Elena Undone
3580.Description: Fate brings two diversely different women together, and sets them on a collision course that will shatter their preconceived notions about love, life and the power of one's soul

3581.Title: Last Days Here
3581.Description: A rocking biopic documenting a heavy metal band's triumphant return to form, one of the most unbelievable true comeback stories in rock and roll history

3582.Title: Back in Time
3582.Description: Back in Time is a look at the impact the Back to the Future movies have had on our culture. From Spielberg to Zemeckis, Lloyd and Fox, paired with amazing trilogy fans, Back in Time features interviews and footage that must be seen.

3583.Title: Flesh and Blood
3583.Cast: Christopher Eccleston, Emma Cunniffe, Stephen Graham
3583.Description: Joe Broughton seems to have his life sorted, a gifted carpenter with a loving wife and a new-born baby, but there's still something missing. Adopted at birth he becomes fixated on finding his birth parents and follows a trail leading to a revelation that turns his world upside down.

3584.Title: Clemency
3584.Description: Years of carrying out death row executions have taken a toll on prison warden Bernadine Williams (Alfre Woodard). As she prepares to execute another inmate, Bernadine must confront the psychological and emotional demons her job creates.

3585.Title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
3585.Cast: Abigail Spencer, Chad Michael Murray, Katee Sackhoff, Emily Alyn Lind, Cicely Tyson, Andrea Frankle, Brad James, Lance E. Nichols
3585.Description: A couple's Georgia dream home becomes a living nightmare when their daughter begins to have frightening visions from the property's terrible past.

3586.Title: Books of Blood
3586.Description: A journey into uncharted territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

3587.Title: The Secret Garden
3587.Country: United Kingdom, France, United States, China
3587.Description: A new take on the beloved classic novel, a young orphan girl who, after being sent to live with her uncle, discovers a magical garden on the grounds of his estate.

3588.Title: Waiting for the Barbarians
3588.Description: A local magistrate reevaluates his loyalty to his nation while holed up at a remote outpost.

3589.Title: Caveman
3589.Cast: Ringo Starr, Dennis Quaid, Shelley Long, Jack Gilford, Cork Hubbert, Mark King, Paco Morayta, Evan Kim, Ed Greenberg, Carl Lumbly, Jack Scalici, Gigi Vorgan
3589.Description: Former Beatle Ringo Starr, Barbara Bach, Dennis Quaid and Shelley Long bond together in a hilarious love story for the ages...the stone ages...as a weakling caveman (Starr) struggles to win the heart of the lovely Lana (Bach)!

3590.Title: Teen Spirit
3590.Description: Violet (Elle Fanning) is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

3591.Title: Teen Spirit
3591.Cast: Cassie Scerbo, Lindsey Shaw, Chris Zylka, Tim Gunn, Carissa Capobianco, Gabriela Lopez
3591.Description: To save her soul, Amber must pull off a high-school miracle.

3592.Title: Ordinary Love
3592.Description: Joan and Tom are an everyday couple with a remarkable love. When Joan is diagnosed with breast cancer, the course of her treatment shines a light on their enduring devotion, as they must find the humor and grace to survive a year of adversity.

3593.Title: Dog Days
3593.Description: Dog Days is a hilarious and heartfelt comedy that follows the lives of multiple dog owners and their beloved fluffy pals around Los Angeles. When these human and canines’ paths start to intertwine, their lives begin changing in ways they never expected.

3594.Title: A Boy Named Charlie Brown
3594.Description: Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the Peanuts gang in their feature film debut! Charlie has a chance to win the respect of his friends when he enters a school spelling bee and winds up in the big city for the finals.

3595.Title: Too Funny to Fail: The Life & Death of The Dana Carvey Show
3595.Description: Why did "The Dana Carvey Show," with a writer’s room and cast including then unknowns Steve Carell, Stephen Colbert, Robert Smigel, and more, flop so spectacularly? "Too Funny to Fail" tells the true story of genius misfits who set out to make comedy history.

3596.Title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
3596.Description: Ruby and Josh spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance. This charming walk and talk romance takes full advantage of the magical landscape that is Hong Kong at night.

3597.Title: Dark Was the Night
3597.Description: When a logging company decimates a forest in a small town, a sheriff (Kevin Durand) and his deputy (Lukas Haas) must confront the violent and unexplainable events that follow.

3598.Title: Dark Was the Night
3598.Cast: Kevin Durand, Lukas Haas, Bianca Kajlich
3598.Description: Maiden Woods is a remote and quiet town of decent hard-working people, but something stirs in the dark woods surrounding this isolated community. After a logging company decimates an area of the forest, a rash of increasingly violent and unexplainable events transpires.

3599.Title: Primal
3599.Description: Hunter and collector Frank Walsh expects a big payday after bagging a priceless white jaguar for a zoo. But the ship bearing Frank's precious cargo has another predator – a political assassin facing extradition to America. When the prisoner manages to break free, Walsh must utilize his expert skills to capture the dangerous killer – not dead, but alive.

3600.Title: Grand Isle
3600.Description: Walter (Nicolas Cage) and his neglected wife lure a young man into their Victorian home to escape a hurricane. When the man is charged with murder by Det. Jones (Kelsey Grammar), he must reveal the couple's wicked secrets to save himself.

3601.Title: The Donut King
3601.Description: Everything you thought you knew about the donut begins with Ted Ngoy. This is the unlikely story of a Cambodian refugee arriving in America in 1975 and building a multi-million-dollar empire baking America’s favorite pastry.

3602.Title: The Furies
3602.Description: Western depicting the clash between a self-made cattle king of the Old West and his equally iron-willed daughter. Based on Niven Busch's novel.

3603.Title: Little Woods
3603.Description: Ollie (Tessa Thompson) is at the end of her probation after running prescription pills. But when her mother dies, she is thrust back into the life of her sister Deb (Lily James), who is contending with an unplanned pregnancy and a deadbeat ex.

3604.Title: Hannie Caulder
3604.Description: A woman begins a lonely search for the bank robbers who murdered her husband.

3605.Title: Hannie Caulder
3605.Cast: Raquel Welch, Robert Culp, Ernest Borgnine, Christopher Lee, Jack Elam, Strother Martin, Diana Dors, Luis Barboo, Stephen Boyd, Brian Lightburn, Aldo Sambrell
3605.Description: Hannie enlists the aid of bounty hunter Tom Price to teach her how to be a gunfighter so she can hunt down the 3 men who killed her husband and raped her.

3606.Title: Tesla
3606.Description: Visionary inventor Nikola Tesla fights an uphill battle to bring his revolutionary electrical system to fruition, then faces thornier challenges with his new system for worldwide wireless energy.

3607.Title: Running with the Devil
3607.Description: When a cocaine shipment is compromised, a drug cartel’s CEO, known as The Boss orders his most trusted henchman, The Cook, and his partner, another master drug trafficker known as The Man, on a dangerous journey to audit the company’s supply chain.

3608.Title: You Cannot Kill David Arquette
3608.Description: Actor David Arquette returns to the professional wrestling ring for a series of matches.

3609.Title: 100% Wolf
3609.Description: Freddy Lupin can't wait to become a werewolf, just like his legendary father. But when the big day arrives, something goes awry and Freddy transforms into a ferocious…poodle.

3610.Title: Bad Company
3610.Description: Adventurous tale of two young drifters who wildly rob their way West during the Civil War.

3611.Title: Bad Company
3611.Cast: Jeff Bridges, Barry Brown, Jim Davis, David Huddleston
3611.Description: A group of naive boys find that life as desperadoes in the west is more serious that they understood when they embark on abortive careers in bushwhacking. Violence, betrayal, sombre colours and a Beckettsian whimsy mark this ironic western.

3612.Title: Pilgrimage
3612.Description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

3613.Title: Reaching for the Moon
3613.Description: A chronicle of the complicated love affair between Pulitzer Prize-winning American poet (and lesbian) Elizabeth Bishop and acclaimed Brazilian architect Lota de Macedo Soares.

3614.Title: Reaching for the Moon
3614.Description: Wall Street wizard, Larry Day, new to the ways of love, is coached by his valet. He follows Vivian Benton on an ocean liner, where cocktails, laced with a "love potion," work their magic.

3615.Title: Night of the Kings
3615.Description: A young man is sent to a prison in the middle of the Ivorian forest ruled by its inmates. As tradition goes with the rising of the red moon, he is designated by the Boss to be the new “Roman” and must tell a story to the other prisoners.

3616.Title: Overdrive
3616.Description: Scott Eastwood stars in this action-adventure from the writers of 2 Fast 2 Furious and the director of Taken. When two legendary car thieves are caught stealing from a mafia boss, they are given a week to nab a vintage Ferrari, or risk losing everything.

3617.Title: Stray
3617.Description: In STRAY, a trio of canine outcasts roam the streets of Istanbul. Through their eyes and ears, we are shown an intimate portrait of the life of a city and its people.

3618.Title: Open Water 2: Adrift
3618.Description: A yacht party takes a terrifying turn for the worse when the revelers get stuck in the water with no way back on board.

3619.Title: Priceless
3619.Description: A widower who loses custody of his daughter finds himself unable to hold down a job. He agrees to drive a truck across the country, no questions asked. He discovers what he is delivering, he is faced with a life-changing choice.

3620.Title: Priceless
3620.Cast: Audrey Tautou, Gad Elmaleh, Marie-Christine Adam, Vernon Dobtcheff, Jacques Spiesser, Annelise Hesme
3620.Description: On the French Riviera, nothing comes cheap. And when it comes to men, Irene has very rich taste. One very confusing night, she is duped at her own game. Her knight in shining armor turns out to be a bartender. Irene, however, is the woman of Jean's dreams. The only way to win her heart back is to turn the tables on her. Audrey Tautou stars in a romantic comedy that proves true love is priceless

3621.Title: False Positive
3621.Description: After months of trying and failing to get pregnant, Lucy and Adrian finally find their dream fertility doctor in Dr. Hindle (Pierce Brosnan). But after becoming pregnant with a healthy baby girl, Lucy begins to notice something sinister about Dr. Hindle

3622.Title: The Osiris Child
3622.Description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

3623.Title: The Doorman
3623.Description: A former Marine turned doorman (Ruby Rose, JOHN WICK: CHAPTER 2) must call upon all her lethal fighting skills to protect her sister's family and stop a group of vicious art thieves at a New York City high-rise.

3624.Title: Almost Adults
3624.Description: A platonic love story about two life long best friends struggling to keep their friendship together as their lives head in different directions.

3625.Title: The Final Member
3625.Description: Thirty miles from the Arctic Circle, stands the world's only Penis museum. Over 40 years, the founder and curator has collected every specimen from every mammal except for one: The Human Specimen.

3626.Title: Neil Young: Heart of Gold
3626.Description: Filmmaker Jonathan Demme captures the rocker in concert before a live audience at Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, Tennessee.

3627.Title: Getting Go: The Go Doc Project
3627.Description: After becoming infatuated with a hunky New York go-go dancer, college boy Doc devises a plan to get close to his crush by asking him to be the main subject in a makeshift documentary.

3628.Title: Getting Go: The Go Doc Project
3628.Description: After becoming infatuated with a beautiful New York go-go dancer, college boy Doc devises a plan to get close to his crush by asking him to be the main subject in a makeshift documentary. But as they grow closer, flirtation blurs the line between subject and filmmaker and Doc is confronted with more than he could ever have imagined.

3629.Title: 28 Hotel Rooms
3629.Description: On a business trip a married woman and a novelist have a 1 night stand. Their affair turns into a relationship when they run into each other a year later.

3630.Title: Maze
3630.Description: Based on the incredible true story of the 1983 mass break-out of 38 IRA prisoners from the HMP Maze high security prison, one prisoner engineers the largest European prison escape since World War II.

3631.Title: Maze
3631.Cast: Barry Ward, Martin McCann, Tom Vaughan-Lawlor
3631.Description: Based on the incredible true story of the 1983 mass break-out of 38 IRA prisoners from the HMP Maze high security prison, one prisoner engineers the largest European prison escape since World War II.

3632.Title: Bull
3632.Description: On the outskirts of Houston, a teen reeling from her mom’s incarceration and an aging bullfighter struggling to keep a foothold in the rodeo circuit, form an unlikely bond and attempt to right their own paths.

3633.Title: Bad Hair
3633.Description: In this horror satire set in 1989, Bad Hair follows an ambitious young woman who gets a weave in order to succeed in the image-obsessed world of music television. However, her flourishing career comes at a great cost when she realizes that her new hair may have a mind of its own.

3634.Title: Little Joe
3634.Description: Alice is a corporate plant breeder. Against company policy, she takes home her newest creation –  a flower capable of making its owner happy. But as ‘Little Joe’ grows, so too do suspicions that it may not be as harmless as it seems.

3635.Title: The Orange Years: The Nickelodeon Story
3635.Description: The Orange Years chronicles the rise of the Nickelodeon network, featuring interviews with the actors, writers, and creators from all the golden age Nickelodeon shows that shaped your lives. It’s wild. It’s crazy. It changed the world.

3636.Title: The Fight
3636.Description: At a defining moment in American history, a scrappy team of heroic ACLU lawyers battles for abortion rights, immigrant rights, LGBTQ rights and voting rights.

3637.Title: The Mandela Effect
3637.Description: A man becomes obsessed with facts and events that have been collectively misremembered by thousands of people. Believing the phenomena to be the symptom of something larger, his obsession eventually leads him to question reality itself.

3638.Title: The Mandela Effect
3638.Cast: Charlie Hofheimer, Aleksa Palladino, Robin Lord Taylor, Madeleine McGraw, Clarke Peters
3638.Description: A man becomes obsessed with facts and events that have been collectively misremembered by thousands of people. Believing the phenomena to be the symptom of something larger, his obsession eventually leads him to question reality itself.

3639.Title: The Ladies Man
3639.Cast: Jerry Lewis, Helen Traubel, Kathleen Freeman, Hope Holiday, Lynn Ross
3639.Description: After being jilted by his gal, Herbert swears off romance and is determined to live his life as a confirmed bachelor. However, he then finds employment at a Hollywood boardinghouse for women, and the female residents go wild over the new help!

3640.Title: Crypto
3640.Description: In this cyber-thriller starring Kurt Russell and Beau Knapp, a Wall Street banker connects a small-town art gallery to a global conspiracy, putting his own family in grave danger.

3641.Title: A Score to Settle
3641.Description: With only a short time to live, Frankie Carver is released from prison, vowing to track down every last member of the gang that betrayed him.

3642.Title: WolfCop
3642.Description: One evening during the late shift, Lou investigates a mysterious disturbance at the edge of town and wakes up with a pentagram carved in his chest, heightened senses and body hair that’s growing at an alarming rate.

3643.Title: The Owners
3643.Description: When a group of friends break into an empty house, the elderly couple that lives there comes home early and the would-be thieves suddenly must fight to save themselves.

3644.Title: The Sweet Life
3644.Description: The classic story of “Boy Meets Girl” … until Girl convinces Boy to drive to San Francisco with her … so they can throw themselves off the Golden Gate Bridge. Only they fall in love along the way.

3645.Title: The Panama Papers
3645.Director: Director Alex Winter goes inside the biggest global corruption scandal in history that was uncovered by hundreds of journalists, working in secret and at enormous risk.
3645.Description: Director Alex Winter goes inside the biggest global corruption scandal in history that was uncovered by hundreds of journalists, working in secret and at enormous risk.

3646.Title: Vita & Virginia
3646.Description: The seductive true story of Virginia Woolf's love affair with socialite Vita Sackville-West, who inspired one of Woolf's greatest works of literature.

3647.Title: The 10 Year Plan
3647.Description: Myles and Brody are two best friends who make a pact to be a couple if neither has found love in ten years’ time. Now that their arrangement is due, both friends do whatever it takes to avoid becoming each other’s last resort.

3648.Title: A Kind of Murder
3648.Cast: Patrick Wilson, Jessica Biel, Vincent Kartheiser, Haley Bennett, Eddie Marsan, Jon Osbeck, Radek Lord, Christine Dye
3648.Description: Obsessed with an unsolved murder case, a crime novelist stuck in an unhappy marriage fantasizes about killing his wife, who soon turns up dead.

3649.Title: A Kind of Murder
3649.Description: Patrick Wilson and Jessica Biel star in this Hitchcockian noir based on a novel by Patricia Highsmith (The Talented Mr. Ripley, Carol).

3650.Title: Suburban Gothic
3650.Description: When a vengeful ghost starts terrorizing his small town home, Raymond the city-boy has to recruit Becca, the badass local bartender, to solve the mystery of the spirit threatening their lives. Starring Matthew Gray Gubler and Kat Dennings.

3651.Title: The Hornet's Nest
3651.Description: Journalists Mike and Carlos Boettcher follow U.S. troops during nine harrowing days of combat in Afghanistan.

3652.Title: The Hornet's Nest
3652.Description: The Hornet's Nest is a groundbreaking and immersive feature film, using unprecedented real footage to tell the story of an elite group of U. S. troops sent on a dangerous mission deep inside one of Afghanistan's most hostile valleys. What was planned as a single day strike turned into nine intense days of combat against an invisible, hostile enemy in terrain where troops had never dared go before.

3653.Title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
3653.Cast: Martin Lawrence, James Earl Jones, Joy Bryant, Margaret Avery, Mike Epps, Mo'Nique, Cedric the Entertainer, Nicole Ari Parker, Michael Clarke Duncan, Louis C.K.
3653.Description: R.J. travels to Georgia for his parents' 50th anniversary. But after pompously flaunting his Hollywood lifestyle, he must examine what he's become.

3654.Title: The Other Man
3654.Description: A taut thriller, The Other Man is an intimate tale of a man who discovers his wife's infidelity and sets out to track down his rival. Driven to pursue the mystery surrounding his wife’s adultery, Liam Neeson embarks on a global pursuit with a haunted passion that begins to probe the nature not simply of jealousy, but of loss and forgiveness. The film is beautifully shot on location in Milan and Lake Como as well as in London and Ely by renowned cinematographer Harris Zambarloukos (Mama Mia!, Heart in the Sand.)

3655.Title: The Other Lamb
3655.Description: A young woman born into an all-female cult begins to question the teachings of her leader.

3656.Title: The Houses October Built
3656.Description: Looking to find an authentic, blood-curdling good fright for Halloween, five friends set off on a road trip in an RV to track down the ultimate haunted house.

3657.Title: Ozzy
3657.Description: The lovable Ozzy’s pampered life is thrown into turmoil after his family drops him at Blue Creek before their vacation. Ozzy quickly learns that Blue Creek is a dog prison and he’ll need to rely on some new friends to help him break out and get back home.

3658.Title: Once Were Brothers: Robbie Robertson and The Band
3658.Description: A moving story of Robertson’s personal journey, overcoming adversity and finding camaraderie alongside the four other men who would become his brothers in one of the most enduring groups in the history of popular music, THE BAND.

3659.Title: Digging for Fire
3659.Description: The discovery of a bone and a rusty old gun send a husband and wife on separate adventures over the course of a weekend.

3660.Title: A Glitch in the Matrix
3660.Description: Are we living in a simulation? Filmmaker Rodney Ascher (ROOM 237, THE NIGHTMARE) wrestles with this existential question in his latest documentary, a multimedia journey that's part sci-fi mind-scrambler, part true-crime horror story.

3661.Title: Good Deeds
3661.Description: For all his life, wealthy businessman Wesley Deeds (Tyler Perry) has done what's expected of him and has settled into a predictable routine. His life begins to change, however, when he meets Lindsey Wakefield (Thandie Newton), a struggling single mother who has just been evicted. Wesley offers to help Lindsey get back on her feet and, though he's already engaged, romantic sparks begin to fly. Suddenly, Wesley finds himself torn between what is expected of him and what he really wants.

3662.Title: The Face of Love
3662.Description: Annette Bening stars as a widow who falls in love with a man (Ed Harris) who looks exactly like her deceased husband in this moving romantic drama. Also stars Robin Williams.

3663.Title: Stonewall
3663.Description: Passions and politics make a volatile mix in this dynamic drama directed by Roland Emmerich that follows the events that led to the birth of the modern Gay Rights movement.

3664.Title: Stonewall
3664.Cast: Guillermo Diaz, Frederick Weller, Bruce MacVittie, Brendan Corbalis
3664.Description: America comes out of the closet in this exuberant musical comedy based on real events. To the music of The Shangri-Las, Patti LaBelle and Judy Garland, Stonewall mixes outrageous lip-synching with glitter, romance and attitude.

3665.Title: Hello I Must Be Going
3665.Description: A divorcee (Melanie Lynskey) moves back in with her parents and begins a clandestine affair with a 19-year-old suitor (Christopher Abbott).

3666.Title: Racer and the Jailbird
3666.Description: Loyalties are tested when a gangster and race car driver fall in love.

3667.Title: Henry Gamble's Birthday Party
3667.Description: Henry Gamble is turning 17 today. As Henry treads through various sexual possibilities trying to finally come into his own, so too do the adults and teenagers at the party.

3668.Title: Non-Fiction
3668.Description: Juliette Binoche and Guillame Canet star in this witty, seductive tale of sex, lies, and literature from acclaimed director Olivier Assayas (Personal Shopper, Carlos).

3669.Title: 100 Streets
3669.Description: Three people, three extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.

3670.Title: 100 Streets
3670.Cast: Idris Elba, Gemma Arterton, Charlie Creed-Miles, Franz Drameh, Kierston Wareing, Tom Cullen, Ken Stott
3670.Description: 100 Streets is a powerful ensemble drama, follows three contrasting and interwoven stories as they play out in one square mile of modern day London starring Idris Elba and Gemma Arteton. Anybody can make a wrong turn, but it's the journey that allows us to find the right path.

3671.Title: Zoom
3671.Cast: Tim Allen, Courteney Cox, Chevy Chase, Kate Mara, Ryan Newman, Michael Cassidy, Spencer Breslin, Rip Torn, Kevin Zegers
3671.Description: Dragged from civilian life, a former superhero must train a new crop of youthful saviors when the military preps for an attack by a familiar villain.

3672.Title: Body Cam
3672.Description: While investigating the murder of a fellow officer, veteran Renee Lomito discovers a mysterious figure in the body cam footage. Haunted by visions of the event, she suspects something supernatural is targeting the cops in her unit. Now, in a race against time to find the one person who can stop these killings, Renee uncovers a sinister secret among the police force surrounding the shooting and cover-up of an unarmed youth.

3673.Title: Above the Shadows
3673.Description: A supernatural tale starring Olivia Thirlby, Alan Ritchson, Jim Gaffigan, Maria Dizzia, Tito Ortiz, David Johansen, and Megan Fox following an invisible woman who must find her way back with the help of the one man who can see her.

3674.Title: Where Hope Grows
3674.Description: A self-destructive former pro baseball player's faith in God is restored when he meets Produce, an inspirational man with Down syndrome

3675.Title: Buddy Games
3675.Description: Josh Duhamel (in his directorial debut) stars as the leader of a group of lifelong friends who reunite for the ultimate bro-fest contest in this rowdy, star-studded comedy.

3676.Title: XX
3676.Director: Jovanka Vuckovic, Annie Clark, Roxanne Benjamin, Karyn Kusama
3676.Cast: Natalie Brown, Jonathan Watton, Melanie Lynskey, Lindsay Burdge, Sheila Vand, Casey Adams, Breeda Wool, Angela Trimbur, Morgan Krantz, Christina Kirk, Kyle Allen, Mike Doyle
3676.Description: This four-part anthology of short horror films features stories that include some traditional themes but all are shown from a female point of view.

3677.Title: XX
3677.Description: Four dark horror stories by women: Annie Clark with THE BIRTHDAY PARTY; Karyn Kusama exorcises HER ONLY LIVING SON; Roxanne Benjamin screams DON’T FALL; and Jovanka Vuckovic dares to open THE BOX. Award-winning Sofia Carrillo wraps it all together.

3678.Title: Rebuilding Paradise
3678.Description: Ron Howard’s Rebuilding Paradise follows the Paradise community one year after the 2018 Camp Fire, as they come together to recover what was lost.

3679.Title: Let the Sunshine In
3679.Description: Juliette Binoche and Gerard Depardieu star in this charming romantic comedy about a woman looking for love in all the wrong places.

3680.Title: Above and Beyond
3680.Description: In 1948, a group of Jewish American pilots flew for Israel in its War of Independence. The first feature-length doc about the foreign airmen in the ’48 War, ABOVE AND BEYOND weaves interviews and footage to present a fascinating, little-known tale.

3681.Title: Valley Girl
3681.Description: A valley girl and a punk rocker from the city defy their parents and friends to stay together.

3682.Title: The Feels
3682.Cast: Jenée LaMarque, Angela Trimbur, Constance Wu, Josh Fadem, Ever Mainard
3682.Description: During their bachelorette weekend, a lesbian couple's relationship hits a snag when one of the brides confesses to never having an orgasm.

3683.Title: The Feels
3683.Description: Andi (Constance Wu) and Lu (Angela Trimbur) are excited to celebrate their upcoming wedding with a joint bachelorette weekend in wine country. On the first night, things goes awry when one of the brides admits she's never had an orgasm.

3684.Title: My Little Pony: The Princess Promenade
3684.Description: The ponies' annual Spring Promenade goes awry when a 1,000-year-old dragon awakens and fulfills a royal prophecy.

3685.Title: Someone Marry Barry
3685.Description: In this raunchy romantic comedy, a trio of childhood friends schemes to find a wife for their socially inappropriate pal Barry. Their plan backfires when his girlfriend turns out to be just like him. A FilmBuff Presentation.

3686.Title: Rogue
3686.Description: Megan Fox (TRANSFORMERS) plays a battle-hardened mercenary in the wilds of Africa whose team must not only survive against a gang of murderous rebels they rescued hostages from, but a pack of bloodthirsty lions they encounter.

3687.Title: Rogue
3687.Cast: Cole Hauser, Meaghan Rath, Ashley Greene, Sergio Di Zio, Neal McDonough
3687.Description: No good deed goes unpunished. This season, Ethan Kelly moves back to San Francisco to slay his ghosts and seek redemption. But, helping out Ray's ex-addict younger brother soon puts him in the sights of a vicious, corrupt cop. When Ethan fights back, he's dragged into a hellish labyrinth of criminality and betrayal involving the police, a Fortune 500 company, and the Federal government itself.

3688.Title: Damsel
3688.Description: Samuel Alabaster (Robert Pattinson), an affluent pioneer, ventures across the American Frontier to marry Penelope (Mia Wasikowska). As Samuel traverses the Wild West with a drunkard named Parson Henry (David Zellner), their once-simple journey grows treacherous.

3689.Title: I Declare War
3689.Description: A group of friends play an innocent game of Capture the Flag, arming themselves with nothing more than sticks & their imagination. One day the game takes on a more serious tone as their imaginations take them beyond the rules of the game.

3690.Title: Shelley
3690.Description: A childless couple make a bargain with their Romanian maid to serve as a surrogate. When the child inside her begins growing too quickly, it becomes clear that a sinister force is overtaking all of them.

3691.Title: Superpower Dogs
3691.Description: Follow six dogs and their human partners as they brave earthquakes and avalanches, protect endangered species and help people with special needs.

3692.Title: Diane
3692.Description: Mary Kay Place is extraordinary as a woman coming to terms with her troubled past in this beautiful story of redemption.

3693.Title: Ben 10: Secret of the Omnitrix
3693.Description: In a battle with Animo, Ben in hero mode, doesn't listen to reason from Max and Gwen, and gets engulfed in a weird energy light. Little does Ben know that the "self destruct" function on the Omnitrix has just been initiated!

3694.Title: Judy & Punch
3694.Description: Puppeteers Judy and Punch are trying to resurrect their marionette show. The show is a hit due to Judy's superior puppeteering, but Punch's driving ambition and penchant for whisky lead to an inevitable tragedy that Judy must avenge.

3695.Title: Frankenstein and the Monster from Hell
3695.Description: The infamous Frankenstein is again recreated, this time from the spare body organs of the criminally insane.

3696.Title: Digging Up the Marrow
3696.Description: A filmmaker (Adam Green) sets out on a bone-chilling odyssey after meeting a man (Ray Wise) who says that he can produce hard evidence that monsters are real.

3697.Title: Knuckleball!
3697.Description: The definitive documentary about the impossible-to-hit pitch that recounts the 2011 journey of the last professional knuckleball pitchers.

3698.Title: Sordid Lives
3698.Description: In this cult classic comedy from writer-director Del Shores, a gay West Hollywood actor returns home to his small Texas town for his grandmother’s funeral.

3699.Title: Monsters and Men
3699.Description: A bystander films the death of a black man at the hands of police, which sparks rising tensions in a New York neighborhood as some are moved to take a stand.

3700.Title: Sea of Shadows
3700.Description: Sea of Shadows uncovers a black market that threatens the extinction of the vaquita.

3701.Title: Bad Reputation
3701.Description: The life and career of Joan Jett from her early years ripping it up onstage as the founder and backbone of hard-rock legends The Runaways, to her solo career and the enduring presence as a rock 'n' roll pioneer and mentor.

3702.Title: Bad Reputation
3702.Cast: Tabitha Brown, Kelly Goodner, Jennifer Holloway, Jerad Anderson, Jeff Kueppers, Sean A. Mulvihill
3702.Description: A high school girl embraces her 'bad reputation' and takes revenge on the kids who have made her life a living hell.

3703.Title: Carnage Park
3703.Description: A psychotic sniper (Pat Healy) terrorizes a bank robber (James Landry Hébert) and his hostage (Ashley Bell) in the California desert.

3704.Title: Sex Ed
3704.Description: First time teacher Eddie Cole turns his class into Sex Ed., but his students seem to have more experience than he does.

3705.Title: Sex Ed
3705.Cast: Haley Joel Osment, Lorenza Izzo, Kevin Hernandez, Retta, Glen Powell, Castille Landon, Chris Williams, Ray Santiago, Abby Elliott, Parker Young, Laura Harring, Lamorne Morris, Isaac White, Matt Walsh
3705.Description: First time teacher Eddie Cole turns his detention class into Sex Ed., but he might not be the best teacher since his students seem to have more experience than him.

3706.Title: Skin: A History of Nudity in the Movies
3706.Description: A definitive documentary on the history of nudity in the movies, beginning with the silent movie era through present day, examining the changes in morality that led to the use of nudity in film.

3707.Title: Getaway
3707.Description: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller.

3708.Title: A Nice Girl Like You
3708.Description: After being accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend, a violinist creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind journey of self-discovery.

3709.Title: Vault
3709.Description: VAULT tells the true story of a group of small time criminals who attempt to pull off the biggest heist in American history: stealing over $30 million from the Mafia in the smallest state in the union, Rhode Island.

3710.Title: Obey Giant
3710.Description: A documentary that profiles the life and work of artist Shepard Fairey, following his roots in punk rock and skateboarding to his creation of the iconic Obama HOPE poster and the controversy that surrounds it.

3711.Title: Nina
3711.Description: Nina Simone (Zoe Saldana) was one of the century’s most extraordinary talents, but fame and fortune came with a price. Rediscovering the meaning of her life and work took courage, strength and one true friend: Clifton Henderson (David Oyelowo).

3712.Title: Just Charlie
3712.Description: Young soccer star Charlie has the world at his feet. With a top club desperate to sign him, his future is seemingly mapped out. But the teenager sees only a nightmare. Trapped in the body of a boy, Charlie is torn between wanting to live up to her father’s expectations and shedding this ill-fitting skin. Charlie’s next move will tear the family apart and threaten everything they hold dear.

3713.Title: Just Charlie
3713.Cast: Harry Gilby, Patricia Potter, Karen Bryson
3713.Description: Soccer star Charlie has the world at his feet. With a top club desperate to sign him, his future is seemingly mapped out. But the teenager sees only a nightmare. Trapped in the body of a boy, Charlie is torn between wanting to live up to her father's expectations and shedding this ill-fitting skin. Charlie's next move will tear the family apart and threaten everything they hold dear.

3714.Title: Dark Web: Cicada 3301
3714.Description: When hacker Connor and his friends discover a mysterious online treasure hunt, the trio must elude aggressive NSA agents as they race to find the clues and claim the prize.

3715.Title: Gemini
3715.Cast: Esther Anil, Sijoy Varghese, Renji Panicker, Thanusree Ghosh, Sasi Kalinga, Kishore Sathya, Sethu Lakshmi, Rosin Jolly
3715.Description: Despite growing up with traits that set her apart from her peers, a young adopted girl discovers her gift when she takes an interest in spelling bees.

3716.Title: Gemini
3716.Description: A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a Hollywood starlet and her tenacious personal assistant. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.

3717.Title: Robert the Bruce
3717.Description: King Robert the Bruce is injured and on the run from the English army. On the brink of defeat, a widow and her family nurse him back to health and join The Bruce as he sets out to claim the long-awaited freedom of Scotland.

3718.Title: Breaking Fast
3718.Description: Mo, a practicing Muslim living in West Hollywood, is learning to navigate life post heartbreak. Enter Kal, an All-American guy who surprises Mo by offering to break fast with him during the holy month of Ramadan.

3719.Title: Amira & Sam
3719.Description: To help adjust to coming home from war, Sam (Martin Starr, Silicon Valley), takes a stab at stand-up comedy. Amira has fled Iraq and the more time they spend together, the harder it is for them to combat their feelings for one another.

3720.Title: Amulet
3720.Description: Terror strikes when a former soldier takes a job to help a young woman and her housebound mother.

3721.Title: Liz in September
3721.Description: Every year, Liz, a hardcore party girl and womanizer, celebrates her birthday with her friends at a Caribbean beach retreat. This year is different.

3722.Title: Donnybrook
3722.Description: An illicit backwoods cage match draws three desperate souls.

3723.Title: The Devil's Doorway
3723.Description: In 1960, two priests are sent to investigate a miracle in an Irish home for unwed mothers only to discover that one of the residents is possessed by the devil.

3724.Title: An Acceptable Loss
3724.Description: She was the ultimate patriot. Now, what she knows could bring down the government. Tika Sumpter and Jamie Lee Curtis star in this explosive conspiracy of treason and lies.

3725.Title: Take Every Wave: The Life of Laird Hamilton
3725.Description: Experience the white-knuckle thrill of big wave surfing through the eyes of Laird Hamilton, a living legend who conquers the world's mightiest tides.

3726.Title: Notturno
3726.Description: Filmed over three years on the borders between Iraq, Kurdistan, Syria and Lebanon, director Gianfranco Rosi’s Notturno captures the everyday life that lies in the aftermath of tyranny, invasions and terrorism.

3727.Title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
3727.Description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

3728.Title: Fun in Acapulco
3728.Description: Fun In Acapulco portrays Elvis as a sexy lifeguard by day who transforms himself into a popular entertainer at night by singing at a local Mexican resort.

3729.Title: Pledge
3729.Description: Three friends pledge a fraternity that's deadly serious about its secret rituals, turning their rush into a race for survival.

3730.Title: Exit Plan
3730.Description: Insurance claims investigator Max (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) follows the clues of a mysterious death to a remote hotel that specializes in assisted suicide. His search uncovers disturbing revelations that he may not be able to escape.

3731.Title: Sheep & Wolves
3731.Cast: Tom Felton, Ruby Rose, China Anne McClain
3731.Description: In a magical land faraway lives a flock of carefree sheep. When their stress-free life is interrupted by a pack of wolves, the pack's favorite goofball, Grey, takes on the challenge of proving to everyone that he is a worthy leader.

3732.Title: Centigrade
3732.Description: A man and his pregnant wife become trapped in their car when a storm buries them underneath layers of snow and ice. As supplies dwindle and temperatures plunge, the couple must battle the elements and hypothermia in a desperate fight for survival.

3733.Title: A Nasty Piece of Work
3733.Description: A mid-level corporate employee finds out he’s not getting the Christmas bonus he was expecting, but his boss invites him to earn a promotion by beating his professional rival in a violent competition.

3734.Title: Legion of Brothers
3734.Description: Immediately after the 9/11 attacks, less than 100 US Troops were sent on a secret mission to overthrow the Taliban. What happens next is equal parts war origin story & cautionary tale, illuminating the impact of 15 years of constant combat.

3735.Title: Wounds
3735.Description: Disturbing and mysterious things begin happening to a New Orleans bartender (Armie Hammer) after he picks up a phone left behind in his bar. Also starring Dakota Johnson and Zazie Beetz.

3736.Title: Hooking Up
3736.Description: A cynical writer and a hopeless romantic hit the road for a cross-country trip.

3737.Title: Wolves
3737.Cast: Michael Shannon, Carla Gugino, Taylor John Smith, Chris Bauer, John Douglas Thompson, Zazie Beetz, Wayne Duvall, Christopher Meyer, Richard Kohnke
3737.Description: A promising high school basketball player has his eye on an Ivy League scholarship. But his father's secret addictions could ruin everything.

3738.Title: Wolves
3738.Cast: Jason Momoa, Lucas Till, Stephen McHattie, Merritt Patterson
3738.Description: A high-school student wakes to find he is changing into something vicious, unpredictable and wild. He goes in search of his true heritage after his parents are viciously murdered.

3739.Title: Nico, 1988
3739.Description: Nico, 1988 is the story of an artist, a mother, and the woman behind the icon. Approaching 50, Nico's life and career are on the ropes, a far cry from her glamorous days as a Warhol superstar and celebrated vocalist for The Velvet Underground.

3740.Title: Star Kid
3740.Cast: Joseph Mazzello, Richard Gilliland, Corinne Bohrer
3740.Description: Likeable but shy kid Spencer dreams of being like his comic book hero, but his life is strictly grounded in reality. Until the day an extraterrestrial craft crashes nearby, and the cybernetic organism inside invites young Spencer to try on his space suit.

3741.Title: Follow Me
3741.Country: United Arab Emirates, United States, United Kingdom
3741.Description: Aspiring to be an internet celebrity and make big bucks, a filmmaker travels the world to learn the tricks of the trade from social media influencers.

3742.Title: American Gun
3742.Description: A series of interwoven story lines brings to light how the proliferation of guns in America dramatically influence and shape every day lives.

3743.Title: The Tomorrow Man
3743.Description: Ed Hemsler spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie Meisner spends her life shopping for things she may never use. In a small town somewhere in America, these two people will try to find love while trying not to get lost in each other's stuff.

3744.Title: Almost Human
3744.Description: WARNING: GRAPHIC VIOLENCE. A small town in New England becomes a raging inferno of axe murders and alien abduction in this lean, mean and terrifying horror film.

3745.Title: Premature
3745.Description: A young woman finds herself on the precipice of adulthood as she navigates her way through the highs and lows of a life-changing summer romance in Harlem.

3746.Title: Let's Be Evil
3746.Description: In this sci-fi thriller, a desperate young woman takes a job at a school for gifted children only to be thrust into a virtual nightmare and forced to fight for her life.

3747.Title: Big Men
3747.Description: Executive produced by Brad Pitt, Big Men is a real-life Treasure of the Sierra Madre about ambitious people who uncover oil in one of the poorest places on earth. An international suspense story with extraordinary access.

3748.Title: Black and White
3748.Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Jared Leto, Michael B. Jordan, Ben Stiller, Elijah Wood
3748.Description: A group of white high school teens becomes involved with Harlem's black hip-hop crowd.

3749.Title: Journey to the South Pacific
3749.Description: Jawi, a boy living on a tropical island in West Papua, encounters whale sharks, sea turtles and other creatures of the sea.

3750.Title: The Dinner
3750.Description: Two estranged brothers and their wives meet at a restaurant to discuss a grotesque crime committed by their sons. With their involvement still a secret, they must decide how far they’ll go to protect the ones they love.

3751.Title: Eating Animals
3751.Country: United Kingdom, India, Germany, China, United States
3751.Description: What's on your plate? Natalie Portman and Jonathan Safran Foer present this eye-opening look at the food industry and an ethical future free of factory farming.

3752.Title: Into the Ashes
3752.Description: After losing his wife, Nick must decide if he will stay on his new path or exact revenge and force his enemies to pay for what they have done.

3753.Title: Just Eat It: A Food Waste Story
3753.Description: Filmmakers and food lovers, Jen and Grant dive into the issue of food waste from farm and retail, right to the back of their own fridge. In a deliciously entertaining challenge, they pledge to quit grocery shopping and survive only on discarded food.

3754.Title: Chasing Trane
3754.Cast: Denzel Washington, Bill Clinton, Ravi Coltrane, Common, Benny Golson, Jimmy Heath, Wynton Marsalis, Sonny Rollins, Carlos Santana, Cornel West
3754.Description: Featuring interviews, insights and archival footage, this documentary aims to reveal how historical events shaped the music of John Coltrane.

3755.Title: Rabid Dogs
3755.Description: A botched bank robbery becomes a long night's journey into surreal ultra-violence when a gang of criminals take their hostages on a berserk, blood-spattered road trip.

3756.Title: AWOL
3756.Description: Joey joins the Army as a way out of Pennsylvania coal country just as she falls in love with magnetic housewife Rayna. A splendid meditation on the boundless possibilities of first love constricted by the trials of poverty.

3757.Title: The Night Watchmen
3757.Description: Four inept night watchmen and a fearless tabloid journalist, fight a a horde of hungry vampires to save themselves but also the City of Baltimore. Some men were born heros but not these guys.

3758.Title: Cabin Fever: Patient Zero
3758.Description: A group of friends planned the perfect vacation in the Caribbean, but their ultimate weekend devolves into their worst nightmare.

3759.Title: Pit Stop
3759.Description: In this perfectly crafted American drama, openly gay Ernesto and closeted Gabe grapple with the trials and tribulations of being gay in a small, working-class Texas town.

3760.Title: Pit Stop
3760.Cast: Bill Heck, Marcus DeAnda, Amy Seimetz
3760.Description: In this compelling drama, openly gay Ernesto and closeted Gabe grapple with the sad tribulations of being gay in a small, working-class Texas town. Reminiscent of such classic rural gay love stories as "Big Eden" and "Brokeback Mountain," this festival hit is an uplifting love story about male intimacy, the heartache of unsuccessful relationships, and the transformative power of love.

3761.Title: Meeting Gorbachev
3761.Description: Werner Herzog meeting Mikhail Gorbachev opens a fresh door to some of the most significant happenings of the late 20th Century from nuclear disarmament to the reunification of Germany and the end of the Cold War.

3762.Title: We Die Young
3762.Description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

3763.Title: Killers Anonymous
3763.Description: Tensions mount at KILLERS ANONYMOUS, a support group for killers, as the members of the group try to unravel a mystery: Which one of them is responsible for the assassination attempt on a U.S. senator that has the police in the city on high alert?

3764.Description: Ask Dr. Ruth chronicles the incredible life of Dr. Ruth Westheimer, a Holocaust survivor who became America's most famous sex therapist. As her 90th birthday approaches, she revisits her painful past and career at the forefront of the sexual revolution.

3765.Title: Intersect
3765.Description: A group of young Miskatonic University scientists invent a time machine, only to learn that they are being manipulated by mysterious, unseen forces from another dimension.

3766.Title: Intersect

3766.Description: A group of young Miskatonic University scientists invent a time machine, only to learn that they are being manipulated by mysterious, unseen forces. When Ryan Winrich (Jason Spisak of Young Justice) begins to recall forgotten events from his past, a ruinous endgame unfolds, masterminded by strange, otherworldly beings that have influenced him since childhood.

3767.Title: Depraved
3767.Description: Larry Fessenden returns with a modern twist on the Frankenstein myth, featuring a fanatical doctor as he reconstructs an unsuspecting man out of spare body parts.

3768.Title: Mary
3768.Description: Soon after David impulsively buys an abandoned boat for his family business, a mysterious presence begins to terrorize him and his family.

3769.Title: Trick
3769.Description: Every Halloween since “Trick” massacred his classmates at a party, a masked killer reappears to kill innocent people in increasingly terrifying ways.

3770.Title: Passage to Mars

3771.Title: Lucky Day
3771.Description: After being released from prison, a safecracker tries to protect his family from a psychopathic contract killer who's seeking revenge.

3772.Title: Radioflash
3772.Description: In the aftermath of an apocalyptic power outage, a young woman encounters the horrors awaiting her in the darkness as she tries to reunite her family and fight for survival.

3773.Title: The Boy Downstairs
3773.Description: An aspiring writer returns to New York after a few years abroad, only to discover that her ex-boyfriend is living in the same building.

3774.Title: Disappearance at Clifton Hill
3774.Description: Obsessed with memories of an unsolved crime from her childhood, a young woman's investigation reveals the seedy underbelly beneath her idyllic Niagara Falls tourist town.

3775.Title: The Big Ugly
3775.Description: London mob bosses invest in a West Virginia oil deal in hopes of laundering dirty money.

3776.Title: I Met a Girl
3776.Description: An aspiring musician meets Lucy, and falls madly in love. However, when she suddenly vanishes, he impulsively embarks on an epic journey to find her. Meanwhile Nick, who thinks that Lucy is all in Devon’s head, sets off to rescue him.

3777.Title: Mapplethorpe
3777.Description: A portrait of the celebrated yet controversial photographer Robert Mapplethorpe whose relationship with Patti Smith and other icons of the '70s New York influenced his photographs.

3778.Title: Dragonheart: Battle for the Heartfire
3778.Cast: Tom Rhys Harries, Jessamine-Bliss Bell, Patrick Stewart, André Eriksen, Richard Cordery, Martin Hutson, Turlough Convery, Delroy Brown, Tamzin Merchant
3778.Description: When the king of Brittania dies, the dragon who shares his heart must find a new ruler, but the monarch's grandchildren go to war over the throne.

3779.Title: 35 and Ticking
3779.Description: Four friends are approaching the age of 35 and struggling to build families they've dreamed of. They try to rectify their romantic lives and futures while their biological clocks tick away.

3780.Title: Billie
3780.Description: Billie Holiday had one of the greatest voices of all time. This film chronicles her amazing story featuring remastered performances and interviews from musical greats.

3781.Title: 69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez
3781.Description: Part investigative documentary, part real-life gangster movie, this film unpacks the life of polarizing rap sensation and internet troll Tekashi69, aka 69, while chronicling his meteoric rise and fall from fame.

3782.Title: I Trapped the Devil
3782.Description: After trapping what he believes to be the devil, a man caught in a spiral of paranoia, trauma and evil unravels when his estranged family shows up for Christmas.

3783.Title: Anchor and Hope
3783.Cast: Oona Chaplin, Natalia Tena, David Verdaguer, Geraldine Chaplin
3783.Description: Kat and Eva’s happy romance hits a rough patch when Eva decides that she wants a child. Visiting friend Roger could help complete their family.

3784.Title: It Had to Be You
3784.Description: Sonia (Cristin Milioti), a neurotic and charming jingle writer, dreams of having an exciting life. The sudden marriage proposal and subsequent ultimatum from her easygoing boyfriend (Dan Soder) force Sonia to confront whether she wants to join the ranks of her married friends or pursue her fantasies.

3785.Title: It Had to Be You
3785.Cast: Natasha Henstridge, Michael Vartan, Michael Rispoli
3785.Description: Two strangers meet and fall in love during the weekend that they are planning their respective weddings.

3786.Title: Ron White: A Little Unprofessional
3786.Description: Ron White delivers more than an hour of all new material with his signature, irreverent storytelling style and the best comedic timing in the business.

3787.Title: Ron White: A Little Unprofessional
3787.Description: The "Blue Collar Comedy Tour" alum delivers more than an hour of all new material with his signature, irreverent storytelling style and the best comedic timing in the business.

3788.Title: Infamous
3788.Description: A reckless woman and her new boyfriend become social media sensations when she streams their cross-country robberies online.

3789.Title: Hellions
3789.Description: A teenager must survive a Halloween night from Hell when malevolent trick-or-treaters come knocking at her door.

3790.Title: Farewell Amor
3790.Description: Reunited after 17 years apart, an Angolan immigrant welcomes his wife and daughter into his tiny Brooklyn apartment. Now strangers, they find common ground in their shared love of dance.

3791.Title: The Evil in Us
3791.Description: The good times quickly turn into a nightmare when six friends on a remote island unknowingly take a new bio-active drug containing a virus that causes fits of psychotic rage.

3792.Title: This Mountain Life
3792.Description: Martina and her 60-year-old mother embark on a 6-month ski trek through the treacherous Coast Mountains of BC. Their adventure is interspersed with five beautifully crafted portraits of high-altitude human endurance and passion.

3793.Title: Good Boy
3793.Description: When Maggie gets an emotional support dog to help quell some of her anxiety, she finds him to be even more effective than she imagined... because he kills anyone who adds stress to her life.

3794.Title: The Obituary of Tunde Johnson
3794.Description: A wealthy, Nigerian-American teen is pulled over by police, shot to death and immediately awakens, reliving the same day over and over, trapped in a terrifying time loop - forced to confront difficult truths about his life and himself.

3795.Title: The Hug
3795.Description: A children’s party at a pizza arcade turns nightmarish when the birthday boy heads backstage to seek out an animatronic panda who is off duty.

3796.Title: A Crooked Somebody
3796.Description: Michael Vaughn, a phony psychic medium, is kidnapped by a guilt-ridden murderer who believes Michael can help him make peace with the spirit of his dead victim.

3797.Title: Beneath the Darkness
3797.Description: After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.

3798.Title: Beneath the Darkness
3798.Cast: Dennis Quaid, Tony Oller, Aimee Teegarden, Devon Werkheisser, Brett Cullen
3798.Description: After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.

3799.Title: Gayby
3799.Description: "Gayby" is an irreverent comedy about friendship, growing older, sex, loneliness, and the family you chose.

3800.Title: Toni Morrison: The Pieces I Am
3800.Description: This artful and intimate meditation on legendary storyteller Toni Morrison examines her life, her work and the powerful themes she has confronted throughout her literary career.

3801.Title: Backtrace
3801.Description: Twenty years after a botched robbery, three grifters kidnap an amnesia patient to jog his memory and find the long-lost money.

3802.Title: Behind You
3802.Description: Two young sisters find that all the mirrors in her house are covered or hidden. When one of the sisters happens upon a mirror in the basement, she unknowingly releases a malicious demon that had haunted her mother and aunt years ago.

3803.Title: Cruise
3803.Description: Set in the 1980s, a young Italian-American from the "wrong side of the tracks" falls for a Jewish girl from Long Island.

3804.Title: The Resort
3804.Description: Four friends head to Hawaii to investigate reports of a haunting at an abandoned resort. It’s beautiful there, but they soon learn you have to be careful what you wish for.

3805.Title: Trespassers
3805.Description: Two couples rent a gorgeous house in the desert for a sex- and drug-fueled escape from reality – a doomed vacation that quickly escalates into a bloody fight to survive.

3806.Title: Frank Serpico
3806.Description: The courageous police officer known for exposing corruption within the NYPD and inspiring the Al Pacino classic recounts his incredible story in his own words.

3808.Title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
3808.Description: Ash must help Diancie and stop Yveltal's rampage!

3809.Title: In Search of Greatness
3809.Description: IN SEARCH OF GREATNESS is a groundbreaking documentary that reveals the true nature and nurture of the greatest athletes of all time

3810.Description: It started with a YouTube video: a sleeping child, oblivious to the clown slowly emerging from under her bed. Soon, more mysterious videos surfaced. Wrinkles The Clown explores the internet phenomenon and the hysteria it inspired.

3811.Title: Bad Roomies
3811.Description: Two guys find a beautiful young woman to take the place of their missing roommate. Everything seems fine until a horrible mistake on drunken night leads all three on a downward spiral.

3812.Title: Pooka Lives!
3812.Description: A group of thirty-something friends from high school create their own Creepypasta about Pooka for laughs, but are shocked when it becomes so viral on the Internet that it actually manifests more murderous versions of the creature.

3813.Title: Phobias
3813.Description: Five dangerous patients, suffering from extreme phobias at a government testing facility, are put to the ultimate test under the supervision of a crazed doctor and his quest to weaponize fear.

3814.Title: Uncanny Annie

3815.Title: Feral
3815.Description: Six friends fight to survive a cannibal-zombie plague on a camping trip gone terrifyingly wrong. With Halloween's Scout Taylor-Compton and The Walking Dead's Lew Temple.

3816.Title: The Brink
3816.Description: The Brink follows Steve Bannon leading up to the 2018 mid-term elections in the United States. A keen manipulator of the press Bannon continues to draw headlines and protests wherever he goes, feeding the powerful myth on which his survival relies.

3817.Title: Stars Fell on Alabama
3817.Description: Successful Hollywood agent Bryce Dixon is returning to Alabama for the first time in 15 years for his high school reunion.

3818.Title: Ms. Purple
3818.Description: A young woman who works as a karaoke hostess in Koreatown reconnects with her estranged brother in the final days of their father's life.

3819.Title: Red Dog

3820.Title: Red Dog

3821.Title: Citizen Soldier
3821.Description: The true story of some soldiers in a United States Army Infantry Company, part of the Oklahoma National Guard's 45th Thunderbirds Brigade, and their life-changing tour of duty in Afghanistan.

3822.Title: Don't Go
3822.Description: Between dreams and reality lies a terrifying hidden truth… A grieving father's nightmare holds the key to his daughter's death in this tantalizing psychological puzzle.

3823.Title: Crawlers
3823.Description: On Saint Patrick's day – a night of wild parties and drunken revelry – three unlikely friends band together to save a college town from a vicious horde of body-switching aliens.

3824.Title: Soldiers of Fortune
3824.Description: A former Special Forces soldier (Christian Slater) must protect a group of thrill-seeking millionaires who have paid big bucks to take part in a military excursion.

3825.Title: Body at Brighton Rock
3825.Description: An inexperienced park ranger discovers a body on a remote mountain trail and must guard it overnight until the police can arrive. Deep in the wilderness, all alone, she will face her darkest fears.

3826.Title: The Alchemist Cookbook

3827.Title: Ballet Now

With less than a week to pull it all off, Tiler faces the mounting pressures of not only dancing in multiple pieces but also producing and directing this high profile event. The success of the performances rests squarely on her shoulders. Will she pull it off?

3828.Title: Euphoria
3828.Cast: Riccardo Scamarcio, Valerio Mastandrea, Isabella Ferrari, Valentina Cervi, Jasmine Trinca, Andrea Germani, Marzia Ubaldi, Iaia Forte
3828.Description: An entrepreneur prone to partying and his estranged brother, a teacher resigned to a humdrum life, begin to bond under fragile circumstances.

3829.Title: Euphoria
3829.Description: Two estranged sisters reconnect when one suggests traveling to a mysterious and remote castle.

3830.Title: Tru Love
3830.Description: Tru is a serial bed-hopping lesbian who cannot commit to a relationship or a job. Then she meets Alice, a beautiful widow and her good friend’s mother. Tru and Alice strike up an unlikely relationship.

3831.Title: Tru Love
3831.Cast: Shauna MacDonald, Kate Trotter, Christine Horne
3831.Description: A widow, recovering from the death of her husband, comes to the big city to spend time with her busy professional daughter. Instead, she forges and unlikely relationship with a commitment-phobic lesbian who has a past with her daughter.

3832.Title: Joyride
3832.Description: Three fun-loving teenagers decide to leave their dull jobs in California and head north to Alaska'a pipeline in search of romance and adventure.

3833.Title: A Christmas Movie Christmas
3833.Description: Eve and her cynical sister Lacy find themselves trapped inside a Christmas movie where they are the stars.

3834.Title: The Flood
3834.Description: An immigration officer must interrogate an asylum seeker to see if he's lying.

3835.Title: The Flood
3835.Description: The Okavango Delta in Botswana transforms from desert to water wonderland.

3836.Title: Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes
3836.Description: The rise and fall of Roger Ailes, controversial Fox News mogul and Republican king-maker. One of the most powerful and divisive figures in media, Ailes would go down in flames amid scandal, paranoia, and multiple sexual harassment allegations.

3837.Title: The Rape of Recy Taylor
3837.Description: In 1944, when African-American wife and mother Recy Taylor is gang raped by seven white men in Alabama, she speaks out against her attackers, putting herself and her family in danger.

3838.Title: Good Kisser
3838.Cast: Kari Alison Hodge, Rachel Paulson, Julia Eringer
3838.Description: Hoping to give their relationship a boost, Jenna and Kate arrange to spend an evening with a third woman, but things take a turn once the sparks fly.

3839.Title: Good Kisser
3839.Description: Kate and Jenna want to spice up their relationship by opening it up to a third and plan a date with the enchanting Mia.

3840.Title: Good Kisser
3840.Cast: Kari Alison Hodge, Julia Eringer, Rachel Paulson, Courtney McCullough, Carter Rodriquez
3840.Description: Jenna and Kate open up their relationship to an alluring stranger in the hopes of spicing up their two-year romance, only for it to expose the faults in their foundation.

3841.Title: Attack of the 50 Foot Cheerleader
3841.Description: An EPIX original movie in which a college co-ed is transformed into an enormous cheerleader after using an experimental drug.

3842.Title: Attack of the 50 Foot Cheerleader
3842.Cast: Sean Young, Ryan Merriman, Treat Williams, John Landis, Jena Sims, Sasha Jackson, Ted Raimi
3842.Description: Cheerleader Cassie Stratford downs an experimental drug that's supposed to enhance her looks and athletic abilities. But instead, it makes her grow into a 50-foot giant!

3843.Title: The Sunlit Night
3843.Description: The Sunlit Night follows an aspiring painter from New York City to the farthest reaches of Arctic Norway for an assignment she hopes will invigorate her work and expand her horizons. In a remote village, among the locals, she meets a fellow New Yorker.

3844.Title: Knives and Skin
3844.Description: A small-town collapses into disarray after a teenage girl goes missing and her friends and their families become ensnared in a web of lies, suspicion, and depravity.

3845.Title: Curious George: A Very Monkey Christmas
3845.Description: George and The Man in The Yellow Hat are having a merry time counting down to Christmas. But neither can decide what to give each other. Will they find the answers before Christmas morning?

3846.Title: Shared Rooms
3846.Description: In this romantic comedy, married Laslo and Cal take in a gay teen relative; Sid and Gray have a casual online hookup which unexpectedly deepens; Julian and Dylan confront their secret mutual attraction when forced to share a bed for a week.

3847.Title: Shared Rooms
3847.Cast: Christopher Grant Pearson, Alec Manley Wilson, Ryan Weldon, Alexander Neil Miller, Justin Xavier, Robert Werner, Daniel Lipshutz, David Vaughn
3847.Description: A sexy, feel-good gay romantic comedy. In this romantic holiday comedy, married Laslo and Cal take in a gay teen who's been kicked out of his home; Sid and Gray have a casual online hookup which unexpectedly deepens; and Julian and Dylan confront their secret mutual attraction when forced to share a bed for a week. Their stories come together at a "Steve Not Eve" New Year's party.

3848.Title: Bayou Caviar
3848.Description: Oscar® winner Cuba Gooding Jr.’s directorial debut is a thrilling story of sex, murder and revenge set in Louisiana. Also starring Oscar® winner Richard Dreyfus, Famke Janssen (X-Men: Days of Future Past) and Katharine McPhee (Scorpion).

3849.Title: Bayou Caviar
3849.Cast: Cuba Gooding,  Jr., Famke Janssen, Richard Dreyfuss, Lia Marie Johnson, Katharine McPhee, Gregg Bello, Ken Lerner, Sam Thakur
3849.Description: Oscar winner Cuba Gooding, Jr.'s directorial debut is a thrilling story of sex, murder and revenge set in Louisiana. Also starring Oscar winner Richard Dreyfus, Famke Janssen (X-Men: Days of Future Past) and Katharine McPhee (Scorpion).

3850.Title: 10.0 Earthquake
3850.Description: Los Angeles is about to be hit by a devastating earthquake, and time is running out to save the city from imminent danger.

3851.Title: 10.0 Earthquake
3851.Cast: Henry Ian Cusick, David Chokachi, Jeffrey Jones, Kristen Dalton, Cameron Richardson
3851.Description: Los Angeles is about to be hit by a devastating earthquake, and time is running out to save the city from imminent danger.

3852.Title: Tyrel
3852.Description: Tyler (Jason Mitchell) is the lone black man on a weekend getaway with hard partying white strangers. As the testosterone and alcohol get out of hand, Tyler's trip begins to feel like a nightmare.

3853.Title: Madonna and the Breakfast Club
3853.Description: The incredible untold story of pop icon Madonna’s struggling pre-fame years in New York City with her musician boyfriend, Dan Gilroy, and their first band Breakfast Club.

3854.Title: Lost in Hong Kong

3854.Description: Xu Lai had Dreams. He just wanted to be an Artist with a Hot Girlfriend. Now he designs bras, humors his baby-crazy wife, and caters to his loopy in-laws. But he's got a Secret Plan to find his Old Flame, and dodging his DVD-pirating, aspiring-documentarian brother-in-law may be the least of his problems. There's been a murder, and his new Hot Pursuit...might just be from the cops.

3855.Title: All About E

3856.Title: The Current Occupant

3857.Title: Bad Therapy
3857.Description: Bob (Rob Corddry) and Susan (Alicia Silverstone)nsee a marriage counselor, Judy Small, to improve their relationship. However, Judy Small’s dark impulses end up bringing Bob and Susan’s marriage to the breaking point.

3858.Title: Ramen Heads

3859.Title: Cherry Pop

3860.Title: Cherry Pop
3860.Cast: Caldwell Tidicue, Lars Berge, Tempest DuJour, DeTox Icunt, Latrice Royale, Mayhem Miller
3860.Description: A bawdy, uproarious comedy about a newcomer's wild night in a down-and-out drag club. Starring Caldwell Tidicue (Bob The Drag Queen), Tempest DuJour, Detox, Mayhem Miller and Latrice Royale.

3861.Title: Savage State
3861.Description: American Civil War breaks out and a family of French colonists decides to go back to France. Edmond, Madeleine, and their three daughters have to cross the whole country to reach New-York, led by the mysterious and dangerous mercenary, Victor.

3862.Title: Shangri-La Suite

3863.Title: Hillbilly
3863.Description: Hillbilly seeks to expand understanding of Appalachia, tracing the evolution of the `hillbilly' stereotype in media and culture by connecting it to corporate exploitation of the region's natural resources.

3864.Title: Pony Express
3864.Description: In 1860, Buffalo Bill Cody and Wild Bill Hickok are sent to establish a Pony Express service across California.

3865.Title: Christmas on Holly Lane
3865.Description: Three life-long friends reunite on Christmas in order to help each other's lives, and in the process their own as well.

3866.Title: Anacondas: Trail of Blood
3866.Cast: Crystal Allen, Linden Ashby, Danny Midwinter, Calin Stanciu Jr., John Rhys-Davies
3866.Description: Even though the two monster snakes from Anaconda: Offspring are dead, a trail of victim's blood confirms that a new generation of snakes has reached adulthood and is preying upon?EVERYTHING. John Rhys-Davies and Crystal Allen return in the fourth installment of the popular franchise.

3867.Title: Slay the Dragon

3868.Title: After Darkness
3868.Description: Natalia Dyer ("Stranger Things") and Kyra Sedgwick ("The Closer") highlight this apocalyptic sci-fi thriller about a family's fight to survive a solar disaster.

3869.Title: Rag Doll
3869.Description: A rising female star of mixed martial arts uses her success in the ring to temper the violence in her personal life.

3870.Title: The Dustwalker
