4721.Cast: Christian von Koenigsegg, Horacio Pagani, Frank Walliser, Paul, Chris, Dan, Halldora von Koenigsegg, Robert Serwanski, Mike
4721.Description: APEX: The Story of the Hypercar spotlights exotic sports cars designed to blast from zero to 200 miles per hour in seconds. Rocket science meets the auto industry as "APEX" follows a thread that starts in the design studios and R&D labs where these "fighter jets of the street" are created, and leads to a perilous racetrack in Germany where drivers can reach new heights of speed an

4722.Title: Jappeloup
4722.Cast: Guillaume Canet, Marina Hands, Daniel Auteuil, Lou de Laâge, Jacques Higelin, Marie Bunel
4722.Description: Based on the true story of one of France's most beloved sporting heroes. In 1980 Pierre Durand was at the start of a promising law career. To everyone's surprise however, he gave it all up to dedicate himself to his true passion: show jumping. Throwing himself into the endeavor he invested everything he had in a young horse called Jappeloup.

4723.Title: Summer '03
4723.Cast: Joey King, Jack Kilmer, Andrea Savage, Paul Scheer, June Squibb, Erin Darke, Stephen Ruffin, Kelly Lamor Wilson, Logan Medina, Travis James, Bill Eudaly, Elise DuQuette
4723.Description: Summer '03 is the hilarious story of 16-year-old Jamie and her family, who are shocked after her calculating grandmother unveils an array of family secrets on her deathbed, one involving religion, the other of a more personal nature. Jamie is left to navigate her own love life and her closest friendships in the midst of this family crisis, and one of the most memorable summers of her life.

4724.Title: Crips and Bloods: Made in America
4724.Description: With a first-person look at the notorious Crips and Bloods, this film examines the conditions that have lead to decades of devastating gang violence among young African Americans growing up in South Los Angeles.

4725.Title: Ishaqzaade
4725.Description: Rising from the ashes of hooliganism & small town clan wars, comes the love story of a passion ignited by hatred. Of two people. Born to hate. Destined to love. A story about two fiery bloods played by Arjun Kapoor & Parineeti Chopra, and their fight for power & supremacy. A story about love brewing in the often unrealistic and daunting political confines of rural India. A story called ISHAQZAADE.

4726.Title: Topper Returns
4726.Cast: Joan Blondell, Roland Young, Carole Landis, Billie Burke, Eddie 'Rochester' Anderson
4726.Description: A fun-loving young woman Gail (Joan Blondell) is murdered after trading bedrooms with her wealthy friend Ann (Carole Landis). Her ghost seeks aid from Topper (Roland Young) to find the murderer. The cast includes Billie Burke & 'Rochester' Anderson.

4727.Title: Jacknife
4727.Description: JACKNIFE is a captivating drama about one Vietnam veteran and the trials he faces in his life following the war, starring Robert De Niro, Ed Harris and Kathy Baker.

4728.Title: Sharknado
4728.Cast: Tara Reid, Ian Ziering, John Heard, Cassie Scerbo, Jason Simmons
4728.Description: When a freak tornado swamps Los Angeles, thousands of sharks terrorize the waterlogged populace, and nature's deadliest killer rules sea, land, and air.

4729.Title: These Three
4729.Cast: Miriam Hopkins, Merle Oberon, Joel McCrea
4729.Description: Two school teachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.

4730.Title: Ninja III: The Domination
4730.Cast: Shô Kosugi, Lucinda Dickey, Jordan Bennett
4730.Description: An evil ninja attempts to avenge his death from beyond the grave, by possessing an innocent woman's body.

4731.Title: Hawking
4731.Cast: Finlay Macrae, Arthur Pelling, Nathan Chapple
4731.Description: Trace Stephen Hawking's great scientific discoveries and his rise to fame and superstardom.

4732.Title: When Did You Last See Your Father?
4732.Cast: Jim Broadbent, Colin Firth, Gina McKee
4732.Description: Based on the award-winning novel, When Did You Last See Your Father? is an unflinching exploration of a father/son relationship, as Blake Morrison (Colin Firth) deals with his father Arthur's (Jim Broadbent) terminal illness and imminent death.

4733.Title: Hiding Out
4733.Cast: Jon Cryer, Keith Coogan, Annabeth Gish
4733.Description: A very successful stock broker is called to court to testify against a mob boss and is ordered to hide out as a high school student! There's only one thing more frightening than murder: High School.

4734.Title: The Wild Blue Yonder
4734.Cast: Brad Dourif, Donald Williams, Ellen Baker
4734.Description: An alien narrates the story of his dying planet, his and his people's visits to Earth and Earth's man-made demise, while human astronauts attempt to find an alternate planet for surviving humans to live on.

4735.Title: The Dead Lands
4735.Cast: James Rolleston, Lawrence Makoare, Te Kohe Tuhaka, Xavier Horan
4735.Description: Hongi (James Rolleston), a Maori chieftain's son seeks to avenge his father's murder and the slaughter of his tribe. Outnumbered by a band of villains, Hongi must pass through the Dead Lands and forge an alliance with the mysterious "Warrior".

4736.Title: A Prince for Christmas
4736.Cast: Viva Bianca, Kirk Barker, Kelly LeBrock, Maxwell Caulfield
4736.Description: A prince from Europe meets a charming waitress when he travels to America during the Christmas holiday to escape an arranged marriage.

4737.Title: My Blind Brother
4737.Cast: Adam Scott, Nick Kroll, Jenny Slate, Zoe Kazan
4737.Description: A slacker (Nick Kroll) and his blind athlete brother (Adam Scott) compete for the love of the same woman (Jenny Slate) in this hilarious comedy.

4738.Title: Death Machine
4738.Cast: Brad Dourif, Ely Pouget, William Hootkins, John Shariann
4738.Description: Engineering genius and psychopath, Jack, unleashes his newest and deadliest creation against the corporation that fired him.

4739.Title: Alien Code
4739.Cast: Kyle Gallner, Richard Schiff, Mary McCormack, Azura Skye
4739.Description: After deciphering a message found in a satellite, genius cryptographer Alex Jacobs finds himself being stalked by government agents and otherworldly beings.

4740.Title: A Turtle's Tale 2: Sammy's Escape from Paradise
4740.Description: When Sammy and Ray find themselves trapped in The Tank, an underwater aquarium, they must hatch a plan to escape and reunite with their grandkids, Ricky and Ella, and protect them from the dangers of the ocean.

4741.Title: Breathing Fire
4741.Description: Michael, a Vietnam vet with two kids, pulls off a bank heist with his gang, which includes the bank's manager. To ensure the loyalty of everyone involved, Mike makes a special set of keys, so that the hiding place for the loot can only be opened if all the members are present. The bank manager, however, gets cold feet and tries to back out.

4742.Title: Yardie
4742.Cast: Aml Ameen, Shantol Jackson, Stephen Graham, Fraser James, Sheldon Shepherd, Everaldo Creary
4742.Description: Yardie is the fresh, compelling and remarkable directorial debut from Idris Elba.

4743.Title: The Sheik
4743.Cast: Khosrow Vaziri, Hulk Hogan, Dwayne Johnson, Mick Foley, Jim Ross, Seth Green, Jack Black, Jake "The Snake" Robert, Ron Jeremy, Hacksaw Jim Duggan, Nasty Boyz
4743.Description: Once the most outlandish of professional wrestlers, Khosrow Vaziri ("The Iron Sheik"), now at 72, is the most outrageous personality on Twitter. But the story behind the oversized personality is raw, touching, emotional and unbelievable.

4744.Title: Raja Hindustani
4744.Cast: Aamir Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Suresh Oberoi, Johnny Lever, Navneet Nishan, Veeru Krishnan, Kunal Khemu, Pramod Moutho, Mohnish Bahl
4744.Description: When a poor taxi driver falls in love with a wealthy young woman, he must stand up to her family and contend with his own insecurities.

4745.Title: Raja Hindustani
4745.Cast: Aamir Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Suresh Oberoi, Johnny Lever, Navneet Nishan, Veeru Krishnan, Kunal Khemu, Pramod Moutho, Mohnish Bahl, Tiku Talsania, Farida Jalal, Archana Puran Singh, Kalpana Iyer, Pratibha Sinha
4745.Description: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.

4746.Title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
4746.Cast: Dean Ambrose, Roger Cross, Daniel Cudmore, Lochlyn Munro, Ty Olsson, Sarah Smyth
4746.Description: With twelve rounds in the clip and one shot at redemption, WWE Superstar Dean Ambrose takes on the dirty cops who framed him for homicide in this action-packed thriller.

4747.Title: The Booksellers
4747.Cast: Parker Posey, Fran Lebowitz, Gay Talese
4747.Description: A behind-the-scenes look at the New York rare book world.

4748.Title: The VelociPastor
4748.Cast: Gregory James Cohan, Alyssa Kempinski, Jesse Turits, Daniel Steere, Nicholas M. Garofolo, Claire Hsu
4748.Description: After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a prostitute convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas.

4749.Title: Capone
4749.Cast: Tom Hardy, Linda Cardellini, Matt Dillon, Kyle MacLachlan
4749.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Drama, Suspense
4749.Description: A ruthless businessman and bootlegger who ruled Chicago with an iron fist, Al "Fonzo" Capone (Tom Hardy) was the most infamous and feared gangster of American lore. At the age of 47, following nearly a decade of imprisonment, dementia rots Capone's mind and his past becomes present as harrowing memories of his violent and brutal origins melt into his waking life.

4750.Title: Ride
4750.Description: Spin classes can be a bit intimidating. But for Brit, the fear is real when her first class turns into a ride for her life.

4751.Title: Ride
4751.Cast: Helen Hunt, Luke Wilson, Brenton Thwaites
4751.Description: When her son (Brenton Thwaites) drops out of school in New York, a mother (Helen Hunt) drops everything to follow him to California. There, with help from an expert surfer (Luke Wilson), she finds a fresh start of her own in this hilarious and touching film about a mother, her son, and so much more.

4752.Title: 15 Minutes of War
4752.Cast: Alban Lenoir, Olga Kurylenko, Kevin Layne, Michaël Abiteboul, Sébastien Lalanne, David Murgia, Guillaume Labbé, Vincent Perez, Josiane Blasko, Ben Cura, Andre Peirre
4752.Description: Based on the 1976 true story of the Somalian rebel hijacking of a school bus of 21 French children. When diplomacy comes at a stall and time is running out, French captain André Gerval and his team of elite snipers carry out an attack to get the children and their teacher out safely.

4753.Title: Catch Hell
4753.Cast: Ryan Phillippe, Ian Barford, Stephen Louis Grush
4753.Description: Former Hollywood star is kidnapped by two men connected to his past while on location in Louisiana. When he wakes up bound and chained in a rundown shack, he soon discovers the real motives of his captors and finds himself in the middle of a twisted scheme with little chance to survive. With no rescue in sight, he must use every ounce of strength he has left to break free and get his revenge.

4754.Title: True Colors
4754.Cast: Richard Widmark, Dina Merrill, Philip Bosco, Paul Guilfoyle, Steve Morley
4754.Description: While Tim dreamed of working in the Justice Department, Peter aspired to be a high-powered political player - at any cost.

4755.Title: Bharat
4755.Cast: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Jackie Shroff, Disha Patani, Sunil Grover, Guest Appearance - Tabu
4755.Description: Bharat is a journey of a man and a nation together. At the cusp of India's birth as an Independent nation, a family makes an arduous journey to freedom. Played by Indian superstar, Salman Khan in the title role, with Katrina Kaif, Sunil Grover, Tabu and Disha Patni, Bharat is an entertaining and endearing film about a man’s sacrifices to fulfill a promise made to his father.

4756.Title: Outcast
4756.Cast: Nicolas Cage, Hayden Christensen, Alexandre Bailly
4756.Description: A mysterious warrior teams up with the daughter and son of a deposed Chinese Emperor to defeat their cruel brother, who seeks their deaths.

4757.Title: The Secret Diaries of Miss Anne Lister
4757.Cast: Maxine Peake, Anna Madeley, Christine Bottomley
4757.Description: The story of Anne Lister, a 19th-century Yorkshire landowner, industrialist and lesbian. Anne kept a detailed account of her life in a fascinating and painfully honest 4,000,000-word journal. A sizeable portion was written in code, and the recent deciphering of the diaries provides an astonishing insight into the life of the woman who has been called Britain's first modern lesbian.

4758.Title: Jonestown: Paradise Lost
4758.Cast: Rick Roberts, Quentin Krog, Brendan Murray, Alon Nashman, Greg Ellwand, Kevin Otto
4758.Description: This feature length film, a hybrid of documentary and drama, tracks the final, 5-day build up to a horrific doomsday - the infamous mass murder/suicides of Jim Jones' People's Temple on November 18th, 1978. By the end of that day, 918 men, women and children will die.

4759.Title: Crown Heights
4759.Cast: Ron Canada, Nestor Carbonell, Natalie Paul, Amari Cheatom, Lakeith Stanfield, Marsha Stephanie Blake, Zach Grenier, Bill Camp, Josh Pais, Yul Vazquez
4759.Description: When Colin Warner is wrongfully convicted of murder, his best friend, Carl King, devotes his life to proving Colin’s innocence. Adapted from This American Life, this is the incredible true story of their harrowing quest for justice.

4760.Title: White Tiger
4760.Cast: Aleksey Vertkov, Vitaliy Kishchenko, Valeriy Grishko
4760.Description: Great Patriotic War, early 1940s. After barely surviving a battle with a mysterious, ghostly-white Tiger tank, Red Army Sergeant Ivan Naydenov becomes obsessed with its destruction.

4761.Title: Prescription Thugs
4761.Director: Chris Bell, Josh Alexander, Greg Young
4761.Description: A documentarian uses his own family's experiences as a springboard to explore the ethical issues surrounding the FDA and pharmaceutical industry.

4762.Title: Prescription Thugs
4762.Cast: Christopher Bell, Matthew "Horshu" Wiese, Chris Leben, Ted Lieu, Richard Taite, David Healy, Greg Critser
4762.Description: In this follow-up to his film 'Bigger Stronger Faster,' director Chris Bell turns his camera on the abuse of prescription drugs and, ultimately, himself.

4763.Title: Digging to China
4763.Cast: Cathy Moriarty, Evan Rachel Wood, Mary Stuart Masterson, Kevin Bacon
4763.Description: Kevin Bacon stars in this touching comedic look at the friendship between an adolecent girl and a mentally retarded young man.

4764.Title: Mountain Patrol
4764.Cast: Duobujie, Lei Zhang, Dao Qi, Xueying Zhao, Zhanlin Ma
4764.Description: A moving true story about volunteers protecting antelope against poachers in the severe mountains of Tibet.

4765.Title: Gamera 3: Revenge of Iris
4765.Cast: Shinobu Nakayama, Ai Maeda, Yukijirô Hotaru
4765.Description: As Gyaos monsters begin to attack Japan again, a young girl - whose parents died during a previous monster conflict - discovers a new creature called Iris. After merging with the girl, the trauma-powered Iris seeks revenge on Gamera, who seems to be losing his patience with humankind.

4766.Title: Changeland
4766.Cast: Seth Green, Breckin Meyer, Brenda Song, Clare Grant, Macaulay Culkin, Kedar Williams-Stirling, Rose Williams, Randy Orton
4766.Description: Directed by and starring Seth Green, the film follows two estranged best friends on a life-changing adventure in Thailand. This epic trip reminds them that there's no problem that friendship and a few rounds in a Muay Thai boxing ring can't fix. Also starring Macaulay Culkin, Breckin Meyer ("Robot Chicken"), and Brenda Song ("Station 19").

4767.Title: Our Town
4767.Cast: William Holden, Martha Scott, Fay Bainter, Beulah Bondi, Thomas Mitchell, Guy Kibbee, Stuart Erwin, Frank Craven, Doro Merande, Philip Wood, Ruth Tobey, Douglas Gardner, Arthur B. Allen, Charles Trowbridge, Spencer Charters, Dix Davis, Tim Davis, Tom Drake, Dan White
4767.Description: Change comes slowly to a small New Hampshire town in the early 20th century. Birth, life and death in this small community, based on a Thornton Wilder play. Sweet and sensitive. Buoyed by wise performances. Very moving.

4768.Title: Faster
4768.Cast: Ewan McGregor, Valentino Rossi, Max Biaggi, Garry McCoy, John Hopkins, Wayne Rainey, Kevin Schwantz, Kenny Roberts, Barry Sheene
4768.Description: Filmed around the world in 2001 and 2002, Faster captures the rise of MotoGP superstar Valentino Rossi amid ferocious competition, especially from his bitter rival Max Biaggi.

4769.Title: Andy Murray: Resurfacing
4769.Description: A documentary film that tracks the tennis star’s devastating injury journey between 2017-2019. From the front lines of surgical theatres, to the intimate corners of his home, we live alongside and witness Andy at his most vulnerable. Considered Britain’s greatest sportsman ever, we see why Andy puts himself through the unimaginable to get back to the sport he loves.

4770.Title: Night Tide
4770.Cast: Dennis Hopper, Linda Lawson, Gavin Muir, Luana Anders
4770.Description: While on shore leave, sailor Johnny Drake (Dennis Hopper) becomes enamored of Mora (Linda Lawson), a young woman who works as a "mermaid" at a sideshow attraction. But for Mora it's no act, she actually believes that she really is a mermaid.

4771.Title: High Society
4771.Cast: Park Hae-il, Su Ae, Yoon Je-moon, Ra Mi-ran, Lee Jin-wook, Kim Gyu-sun, Han Ju-yeong, Kim Hae-gon, Nam Moon-cheol, Jang So-yeon
4771.Description: A deputy curator of a chaebol-funded art gallery and her husband, a politically ambitious economics professor, will do anything to join the über-elite.

4772.Title: Chandramukhi
4772.Cast: Rajinikanth, Prabhu, Jyothika, Nayanthara, Vadivelu, Nassar, Vineeth, Sheela
4772.Description: Rajnikant a top psychiatrist from America is on an SOS mission to help rescue his best friend Prabhu's wife Jyothika, who suffers from a split personality syndrome. Rajnikant couples his treatment with exorcism to cure Jyothika.

4773.Title: The Night Watch
4773.Cast: Anna Maxwell Martin, Claire Foy, Jodie Whittaker, Anna Wilson Jones, Harry Treadaway
4773.Description: Set against the turbulent backdrop of London in the 1940s, this adaptation of Sarah Waters' bestselling novel, The Night Watch, follows four young Londoners inextricably linked by their wartime experiences. In a time when the barriers of sexual morality and social convention have been broken down, Kay, Helen, Viv and Duncan enjoy a freedom never experienced before.

4774.Title: Decoding Annie Parker
4774.Cast: Helen Hunt, Samantha Morton, Aaron Paul, Rashida Jones
4774.Description: Love, science, sex, infidelity, disease and comedy, the wild, mostly true story of the irrepressible Annie Parker and the almost discovery of a cure for cancer.

4775.Title: Message Man
4775.Cast: Paul O'Brien, Verdi Solaiman, Valentine Payen
4775.Description: A retired assassin's past catches up with him and his brutality surfaces as he goes on a final killing spree to make things right.

4776.Title: Think Like a Dog
4776.Cast: Gabriel Bateman, Josh Duhamel, Megan Fox, Kunal Nayyar, Julia Jones, Janet Montgomery, Bryan Callen, Todd Stashwick, Neo Hooo
4776.Description: After a 12-year-old tech prodigy's science experiment goes awry, he forges a telepathic connection with his best friend and dog, Henry, in this whimsical family comedy.

4777.Title: Night of the Demons
4777.Cast: Shannon Elizabeth, Tatyana Kanavka, Michael Arata
4777.Description: A group of kids go to a Halloween party, only to have to face down a group of demons.

4778.Title: Luxor
4778.Cast: Andrea Riseborough, Karim Saleh, Michael Landes, Shirin Redha, Shahira Fahmy, Salima Ikram
4778.Description: When British aid worker Hana returns to the ancient city of Luxor, she comes across Sultan, an archeologist and former lover. As she wanders, haunted by the familiar place, she struggles to reconcile the choices of the past with the uncertainty of the present.

4779.Title: Paper Planes
4779.Cast: Sam Worthington, Ed Oxenbould, Deborah Mailman
4779.Description: An imaginative children's film about a young Australian boy's passion for flight and his challenge to compete in the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan.

4780.Title: The Glorias
4780.Cast: Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander, Timothy Hutton, Lorraine Toussaint, Janelle Monáe, Bette Midler
4780.Description: Based on Gloria Steinem's autobiographical book, "My Life on the Road," THE GLORIAS weaves a compelling, nontraditional tapestry of one of the most inspirational and legendary figures in modern history.

4781.Title: Twenty Bucks
4781.Cast: Linda Hunt, Brendan Fraser, Elisabeth Shue, Steve Buscemi, Christopher Lloyd, William H. Macy, Jeremy Piven, David Schwimmer
4781.Description: This multi-character comedy follows the path of a single twenty dollar bill in a city neighborhood,focusing on various holders and their intertwining stories, including two convenience store robbers, an estranged father and daughter and a young newlywed couple. Featuring performances by Elisabeth Shue, Christopher Lloyd, Linda Hunt and Spalding Gray.

4782.Title: The Competition
4782.Cast: Thora Birch, Chris Klein, Claire Coffee, David Blue, Kelsey Tucker, Michael Draper, Jason Tobias, Gabrielle Stone, Catherine Johnson, Tiffany Fallon
4782.Description: After developing an "infidelity formula" said to repel cheating, a popular blogger crosses paths with a charming lawyer willing to put it to the test.

4783.Title: The Competition
4783.Cast: Richard Dreyfuss, Amy Irving, Lee Remick, Sam Wanamaker
4783.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Drama, Romance
4783.Description: While competing against each other in a music contest, two pianists (Richard Dreyfuss, Amy Irving) fall in love and must battle to stay together in case either of them wins. Oscar-nominated for Best Song and Best Film Editing.

4784.Title: Chandni
4784.Cast: Vinod Khanna, Rishi Kapoor, Sridevi, Waheeda Rehman, Sushma Seth, Beena Banerjee
4784.Description: In a cruel stroke of fate, Chandni’s (Sridevi) heart is shattered as Rohit (Rishi Kapoor) disappears from her life. When she meets Lalit (Vinod Khanna) who is fighting the demons of tragic memories, they both find solace in this new friendship. Lalit’s affection gives a new direction to Chandni’s life, but Lalit falls for her and Chandni resigns to destiny, till one day, Rohit knocks on her door.

4785.Title: Domino
4785.Cast: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Carice van Houten, Eriq Ebouaney, Guy Pearce, Mohammed Azaay, Søren Malling, Paprika Steen, Helena Kaittani
4785.Country: Denmark, France, Belgium, Italy, Netherlands, United States, United Kingdom
4785.Description: A Copenhagen police officer hunts for the man who attacked his partner, only to stumble into a high-stakes game of espionage.

4786.Title: Domino
4786.Cast: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Carice van Houten, Guy Pearce
4786.Description: In order to seek justice for their partner's murder, Copenhagen police officer (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) and a fellow cop embark on a deadly mission to hunt down a mysterious man in this fast-paced action thriller.

4787.Title: Vazhakku Enn 18/9
4787.Cast: Sri, Urmila Mahanta, Mithun Murali, Manisha Yadav, Rethika Srinivas
4787.Description: A poor Venu works at a roadside shop and loves Jyothi, who is employed in the adjoining apartment. Before Venu gets a chance to express his love to her, she meets with an accident and he is arrested.

4788.Title: Take Care
4788.Cast: Leslie Bibb, Kevin Curtis, Nadia Dajani
4788.Description: When a car crash leaves Frannie immobilized, she is brushed off by everyone she can count on. With nowhere else to turn, Frannie reluctantly calls her ex, Devon, for help. It isn't long before old wounds emerge and are made worse when Devon's crazy new girlfriend shows up.

4789.Title: The Last Witness
4789.Cast: Alex Pettyfer, Robert Wieckiewicz, Talulah Riley
4789.Description: An ambitious young journalist uncovers the horrific slaughter of 22,000 Polish officers during the Second World War. A secret that has been kept hidden for far too many years.

4790.Title: Watermelon Man
4790.Cast: Godfrey Cambridge, Estelle Parsons, Howard Caine
4790.Description: When racist white insurance agent Jeff Gerber wakes up one morning to discover that his skin has turned black, he experiences bigotry first hand as his family, neighbors, and employers react to his transformation. Now suffering from the effects of racial discrimination, Jeff must reassess his priorities in life.

4791.Title: Lady Bloodfight
4791.Cast: Amy Johnston, Muriel Hofmann, Jenny Wu, Kathy Wu, Jet Tranter, Mayling Ng
4791.Description: An American travels to Hong Kong in hopes of winning a lucrative – but potentially deadly – all-female underground fighting tournament.

4792.Title: Lady Bloodfight
4792.Cast: Amy Johnston, Muriel Hofmann, Jenny Wu
4792.Description: Jane, a beautiful but troubled American girl, journeys through the gritty underworld of Hong Kong to The Kumite, an elite all-female fighting competition where the best fighters from around the world battle to the death. As she advances through each round, it's a toss up of which will come first: the title of best female fighter in the world, or death by The Kumite.

4793.Title: Knock Off
4793.Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Rob Schneider, Lela Rochon, Paul Sorvino
4793.Description: A fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

4794.Title: Meeting Evil
4794.Cast: Luke Wilson, Samuel L. Jackson, Leslie Bibb, Peyton List, Ryan Lee, Tracie Thoms, Muse Watson
4794.Description: John (Luke Wilson) is taken on a murder-fueled ride by a mysterious stranger (Samuel L. Jackson) that transforms the weak-willed, disillusioned husband and father into a desperate hero willing to go to any length to protect his family.

4795.Title: Naughty or Nice
4795.Description: Holiday humbug Krissy Kringle receives a special delivery intended for Santa Claus, the Naughty or Nice book he left behind while visiting a child, and uses the power of the book to expose the naughty deeds of those around her, but soon finds that her newfound power isn't always so nice.

4796.Title: Death Ship
4796.Cast: George Kennedy, Richard Crenna, Sally Ann Howes, Saul Rubinek, Nick Mancuso, Jennifer McKinney, Danny Higham, Kate Reid
4796.Description: A mysterious ghostly freighter rams and sinks a modern day cruise ship whose survivors climb aboard only to discover that it is a World War II Nazi torture vessel.

4797.Title: Human Flow
4797.Description: Artist, activist and director Ai Weiwei captures the global refugee crisis - the greatest human displacement since World War II - I in this breathtakingly epic film journey HUMAN FLOW.

4798.Title: Kadaikutty Singam
4798.Cast: Karthi, Sayyeshaa, Sathyaraj, Priya Bhavani Shankar, Arthana Vijayakumar, Soori
4798.Description: Gunasingam, a family-loving farmer who hails from a small town, tries his best to keep his big family united.

4799.Title: Sharknado 3: Oh Hell No!
4799.Cast: Ian Ziering, Tara Reid, Cassandra Scerbo, Frankie Muniz, David Hasselhoff, Mark Cuban, Bo Derek, Ryan Newman
4799.Description: When a mass of Sharknadoes threatens America's East Coast, chainsaw-wielding hero Fin must again risk his life to save his children on spring break. But as he fights his way south, the sharknadoes merge and grow bigger than ever before.

4800.Title: Sugarbaby
4800.Cast: Marianne Sägebrecht, Eisi Gulp, Toni Berger
4800.Description: An asocial, obese German woman lives in a large city. Unfortunately despite her kind and intelligent personality, she has had a lot of trouble making a connection with people, until she gets a crush on a handsome subway conductor.

4801.Title: Goodbye World
4801.Cast: Adrian Grenier, Ben McKenzie, Scott Mescudi
4801.Description: When a mysterious terrorist attack causes chaos in the cities, a group of friends take refuge in their countryside cabin. But the challenges of living in a post-apocalyptic world soon take their toll on relationships within the group.

4802.Title: Tiger Orange
4802.Cast: Mark Strano, Johnny Hazzard, Gregory Marcel
4802.Description: Chet and Todd, estranged gay brothers, grew up in a small town in Central California with a homophobic, working class single father. While Todd ran off to Los Angeles and is now out and proud, Chet stayed at home and remained mostly closeted. Broke and homeless, Todd returns to the brother he left behind. Resentments boil to the surface as "Tiger Orange" serves a depiction of family dynamics.

4803.Title: The Isle
4803.Cast: Conleth Hill, Alex Hassell, Fisayo Akinade, Tori Butler-Hart, Alix Wilton Regan, Graham Butler
4803.Description: When three shipwrecked sailors land on an island abandoned except for four sole residents, one sailor starts to question what happened on the island. He must uncover the truth while he battles to save his own life and escape the isle's clutches.

4804.Title: Chicken People
4804.Cast: Brian Caraker, Brian Knox, Shari McCollough
4804.Description: SXSW, AFI Docs alum "Chicken People" takes a humorous and heartfelt look at the colorful and hugely competitive world of champion show chicken breeders. A real life "Best in Show" but about chickens, the film follows the struggles and triumphs of both humans and their chickens on the road to compete at the Ohio National Poultry Show, considered the Westminster of Chickens.

4805.Title: Mulligans
4805.Cast: Charlie David, Dan Payne, Thea Gill, Derek Baynham, Grace Vukovic, Calum Worthy, Amy Matysio
4805.Description: When two college buddies go home for the summer, Tyler's father finds himself irresistibly attracted to Chase. As the family discovers the scandalous affair the question remains - does their father deserve a second chance?

4806.Title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
4806.Cast: Gregory Peck, Susan Hayward, Ava Gardner, Hildegard Knef, Leo G. Carroll, Torin Thatcher, Ava Norring, Helene Stanley, Marcel Dalio, Vicente G?mez, Richard Allan, Olga Borget, John Roy, Amanda Ambrose, Sugarfoot Anderson, Salvador Baguez, Charles Bates, Maurice Brierre, Arthur Brunner, Charles Brunner, Ernest Brunner, Leonard Carey, Benny Carter, Monique Chantal, Andr? Charlot, Edward Colmans, George Davis, James Davis, Amapola Del Vando, Victor Desny, John Dodsworth, Arthur Dulac, Wade Dumas, Elzie Emanuel, Lisa Ferraday, Paul Fierro, Bert Freed, Martin Garralaga, Janine Grandel, Agn?s Laury, Ivan Lebedeff, Pepi Lenzi, Jay Loft-Lyn, Alphonse Martell, George Navarro, Constance Purdy, Tito Renaldo, Julian Rivero, Emmett Smith, Ann Staunton, Paul Thompson, Bertil Unger, Maya Van Horn, Cecil Weston, Victor Wood
4806.Description: The story of a writer of renown, lying injured on the slope of Africa's famous mountain, coming to the end of his life in Africa and looking back to decide if his past had any meaning.

4807.Title: Chinese Box
4807.Description: In the days preceding the Chinese takeover of Hong Kong, an embittered British journalist pines unrequitedly for a beautiful but distant Chinese society woman.

4808.Title: Test
4808.Cast: Scott Marlowe, Matthew Risch, Kristoffer Cusick, Rory Hohenstein, Damon Sperber, James Sofranko
4808.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, LGBTQ, Romance
4808.Description: Set in the early years of the AIDS epidemic, this powerful drama follows a young dancer as he navigates gay life and the modern dance scene in 1980s San Francisco. Starring dance Scott Marlowe, Matthew Risch (HBO's Looking), and featuring captivating dance sequences especially choreographed for the film by acclaimed U.S. choreographer Sidra Bell

4809.Title: Park Avenue: Money, Power & The American Dream
4809.Cast: Paul Piff, Anne Rueth, Colin Dunkley, April Dunkley
4809.Description: If income inequality were a sport, the residents of 740 Park Avenue in Manhattan would all be medalists. This address boasts the highest number of billionaires in the United States, many of whom actively lobby and finance political campaigns to lower taxes on the wealthy. Less than four miles away, Park Avenue runs through the South Bronx, which has the highest poverty rate in the U.S.

4810.Title: American Experience: Tesla
4810.Description: Meet Nikola Tesla, the genius engineer and tireless inventor whose technology revolutionized the electrical age of the 20th century. Although eclipsed in fame by Edison and Marconi, it was Tesla's vision that paved the way for today's wireless world.

4811.Title: Little Secrets
4811.Cast: Evan Rachel Wood, Michael Angarano, David Gallagher, Vivica Fox
4811.Description: Emily Lindstrom, a gifted 14-year-old violinist, skips summer camp in order to prepare for an audition with the prestigious San Francisco Youth Orchestra. Emily has also set up a side business as a "secret keeper", charging a 50-cent fee to share and keep the neighborhood children's secrets. She soon discovers, however, that there is a price to keeping secrets that can't be measured in coins.

4812.Title: Elephant Song
4812.Cast: Bruce Greenwood, Xavier Dolan, Carrie-Anne Moss, Catherine Keener
4812.Description: When a psychiatrist goes mysteriously missing from a hospital that has recently been plagued by scandal, Dr. Toby Green (Bruce Greenwood) is called in to investigate before the news goes public.

4813.Title: Memorial Day
4813.Cast: James Cromwell, Jonathan Bennett, Jackson Bond, John Cromwell, Steven Luke, Emily Fradenburgh
4813.Description: 13-year-old Kyle Vogel discovers the World War II footlocker belonging to his grandfather, Bud. Bud has never talked about the war, yet he finds himself striking a deal with his grandson: Kyle can pick any three souvenirs, and Bud will tell him the stories behind each one. Weaving Bud's complicated wartime past, along with Kyle's wartime future, these two men share parallel experiences in combat.

4814.Title: Dirty 30
4814.Cast: Mamrie Hart, Grace Helbig, Hannah Hart
4814.Description: On the eve of Kate's (Mamrie Hart) 30th birthday, friends Evie (Grace Helbig) and Charlie (Hannah Hart) offer to throw her a party. But the celebration quickly spirals out of control.

4815.Title: Skin Deep
4815.Cast: John Ritter, Vincent Gardenia, Alyson Reed, Joel Brooks
4815.Description: A womanizing alcoholic writer, whose life seems to be falling apart at the seams, repeatedly finds himself in trouble of one sort or another with the law, ex-girlfriends, and jealous boyfriends.

4816.Title: Ava's Possessions
4816.Cast: Louisa Krause, Whitney Able, Deborah Rush, Lou Taylor Pucci
4816.Description: A young woman recovers from a demonic possession.

4817.Title: Maayavan
4817.Cast: Sundeep Kishan, Lavanya Tripathi, Jackie Shroff, Daniel Balaji, Akshara Gowda, V Jayaprakash, Mime Gopi, Bagavathi Perumal, K S Ravikumar
4817.Description: Sundeep Kishan plays a police officer, who is severely injured while trapping a murderer. Couple of months after recovery, he resumes his job and during the process of investigating the murder of an actress (Akshara Gowda) comes across similarities in pattern of this murder with the previous ones. This takes him through few more characters, who are in some way connected with these murders.

4818.Title: I Walk the Line
4818.Cast: Gregory Peck, Tuesday Weld, Estelle Parsons, Charles Durning, Ralph Meeker, Nora Denney, Lonny Chapman
4818.Description: Gregory Peck plays Southern sheriff Henry Tawes, who intends to bring moonshiner Carl McCain (Ralph Meeker) to justice. Instead, Tawes falls in love with McCain's nubile daughter, Alma (Tuesday Weld), and arranges for the feds to keep their hands off McCain's still. The sheriff thus risks completely destroying his work life and home life. Featuring music from Johnny Cash

4819.Title: H.H. Holmes: America's First Serial Killer
4819.Description: At the height of his criminal career, the infamous Dr. H.H. Holmes designed his castle of horrors in Chicago, where he rented rooms to unsuspecting victims visiting the 1893 World's Fair. Further benefiting from his victims, Holmes sold their skeletons to local medical schools.

4820.Title: Love Stinks
4820.Cast: French Stewart, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras, Bill Bellamy, Tyra Banks, Jason Bateman
4820.Description: Seth Winnick has it all: a successful career in television, good friends, and a passionate relationship with beautiful Chelsea. However, when he fails to make a timely marriage proposal, Chelsea tries to make his life hell.

4821.Title: Sharknado 2: The Second One
4821.Cast: Ian Ziering, Vivica A. Fox, Mark McGrath, Kari Wuhrer, Tara Reid
4821.Description: When a Category 7 hurricane pummels New York, the surging flood waters bring thousands of sharks. To make matters worse, tornadoes soon dot the horizon. As Sharknados tear through the city, no vehicle, building, or national monument is safe.

4822.Title: Doug Stanhope: Beer Hall Putsch
4822.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Comedy, Special Interest
4822.Description: Named after Hitler's failed coup attempt, "Beer Hall Putsch" takes you into acerbic comic Doug Stanhope's twisted mind at a gig filmed in Portland.

4823.Title: Man Vs.
4823.Description: When TV host Doug Woods is dropped off in the Canadian wilderness, he's confident he has all the skills necessary to survive the week alone. But when strange things start happening in the forest, Doug realizes he's not the only one out there.

4824.Title: Ishq
4824.Cast: Shane Nigam, Ann Sheethal, Shine Tom Chacko, Lenoa Lishoy
4824.Description: ISHQ is the story of Sachi and Vasudha,two young lovers who went for a romantic interlude one night. During the journey, how fate plays spoilsport and how a normal journey can turn into terror and what impact that incident stamps on their life forms the crux of the story. The movie deals with the issue of moral policing which is rampant in present day India.

4825.Title: Amal
4825.Cast: Rupinder Nagra, Naseeruddin Shah, Seema Biswas, Koel Purie, Vik Sahay, Roshan Seth
4825.Description: Amal is an emotionally evocative story about an auto-rickshaw driver in New Delhi (Amal) who is content with his small, but vital role in life. One day he drives an eccentric billionaire (G.K. Jayaram) who, is searching the streets for the last morsel of humanity and someone he can leave all his money to, and Amal's life may change forever.

4826.Title: Left Behind
4826.Cast: Nicolas Cage, Chad Michael Murray, Cassi Thomson, Nicky Whelan, Jordin Sparks, Lea Thompson, Gary Grubbs, Quinton Aaron
4826.Genres: Action & Adventure, Faith & Spirituality, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
4826.Description: After millions of people on Earth suddenly disappear, a pilot flying a plane stuck at 30,000 feet must find a way to ensure the passengers' survival.

4827.Title: The Runner
4827.Cast: Nicolas Cage, Sarah Paulson, Connie Nielsen, Wendell Pierce, Bryan Batt, Peter Fonda, Dana Gourrier
4827.Description: A New Orleans politician finds his idealistic plans for rebuilding after a toxic oil spill unraveling thanks to a sex scandal.

4828.Title: The History of Time Travel
4828.Cast: Daniel W. May, Elizabeth Lestina, Krista Ales, Garland Buffalo, Trey Cartwright, Ben Everett, Ricky Kennedy, Brad Maule, Roy May, Peyton Paulette, David Raine, Fazia Rizvi, Jody Ryan, Bill Small, Michael Tubbs
4828.Description: A fictional documentary about the creation of the world's first time machine, those who created it, and the unintended ramifications it has on world events.

4829.Title: The Final Season
4829.Cast: Sean Astin, Rachel Leigh Cook, Tom Arnold, Powers Boothe, Dayton Callie, Jesse Henecke, Marshall Bell
4829.Description: The true story of a baseball coach who inspired his team and brought hope to a town when they needed it most. In a small town in Iowa, everyone comes together for high school baseball. As life throws curve balls, the passionate young players, their rookie coach and the hometown fans find that life's greatest challenges strike off the diamond.

4830.Title: Numb
4830.Cast: Jamie Bamber, Marie Avgeropoulos, Aleks Paunovic, Stefanie von Pfetten
4830.Description: When a couple in financial distress discover GPS coordinates that promise to lead to stolen gold they must partner with a pair of mysterious hitchhikers to enter the remote winter wilderness to recover the coins.

4831.Title: Cottage Country
4831.Cast: Malin Akerman, Tyler Labine, Lucy Punch, Daniel Petronijevic
4831.Description: A romantic weekend away turns comically deadly when after accidentally killing his brother, Todd and his fiance must dispose of the evidence and anyone who might suspect them. As the party rages on, the body count rises.

4832.Title: Thaanaa Serndha Koottam
4832.Cast: Suriya, Keerthy Suresh, Karthik, Ramya Krishnan, Senthil, Nandha, Suresh Chandra Menon, Sathyan, RJ Balaji, Thambi Ramaiah, Kalaiyarasan, Sudhakar, Anandaraj, Nirosha, Yogi Babu
4832.Description: Iniyan was one of the victims who was denied of becoming a CBI official. Dejected, he finds a handful of people with shrewd skills and leads them like a pack of wolves, uses his intelligence and their potential to become a 'gang' of CBI officials. In the end, Iniyan portrayed his personal vendetta against the system with the help of his team and how they escaped from the CBI officials and police.

4833.Title: Waiting for Anya
4833.Cast: Noah Schnapp, Thomas Kretschmann, Frederick Schmidt, Anjelica Huston, Jean Reno
4833.Description: From the author of War Horse, a shepherd-boy risks everything to help smuggle Jewish children into Spain from German-occupied France.

4834.Title: Permission
4834.Cast: Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens, Gina Gershon, Francois Arnaud, Jason Sudeikis, Morgan Spector, Sarah Steele
4834.Description: A woman on the brink of a marriage proposal is told by a friend that she should date other men before spending the rest of her life with her boyfriend.

4835.Title: Son of the South
4835.Cast: Lucas Till, Lucy Hale, Julia Ormond, Sienna Guillory, Brian Dennehy
4835.Description: A grandson of a Klansman comes of age in the deep south and joins the Civil Rights Movement. From executive producer Spike Lee and based on Bob Zellner's autobiography, "The Wrong Side of Murder Creek"

4836.Title: A Christmas Kiss II
4836.Cast: Elisabeth Harnois, Adam Mayfield, Elisabeth Rohm, Lola Glaudini
4836.Description: Jenna Kingston didn't expect to be swept off her feet, but when a handsome stranger encounters her in the elevator and notices the mistletoe hanging above them, sparks fly as he leans in for a kiss. There's just one problem: this man is Cooper Montgomery, a playboy who happens to be part owner of the company for which Jenna works.

4837.Title: In Enemy Hands
4837.Cast: Til Schweiger, Thomas Kretschmann, Connor Donne, Matt Lindquist, Andy Gatjen, Rene Heger, Alex Prusmack, Sascha Rosemann, Justin Thomson, Sven-Ole Thorsen, Scott Caan, Clark Gregg, A.J. Buckley, William H. Macy, Jeremy Sisto, Ian Somerhalder
4837.Description: As Hitler's grip of fear continues to tighten during World War II, the capture of the U.S.S. Swordfish by a German U-boat leads to a brutal struggle for survival between axis and allies deep beneath the ocean surface.

4838.Title: The Fanatic
4838.Cast: John Travolta, Devon Sawa, Ana Golja
4838.Description: On the grimy streets of Hollywood, a celebrity-obsessed man feels slighted by his favorite movie star and embarks on an unhinged quest to get a response - leading to a home invasion and a very long night that changes both men irreparably.

4839.Title: Survive the Night
4839.Cast: Chad Michael Murray, Bruce Willis, Shea Buckner, Tyler Jon Olson, Lydia Hull, Riley Wolfe Rach, Jessica Abrams
4839.Description: Bruce Willis and Chad Michael Murray (“One Tree Hill”) must join forces in order to SURVIVE THE NIGHT in this gripping home-invasion thriller about a doctor and his family being held hostage by a wounded gunman and his unhinged brother.

4840.Title: Lost in Thailand
4840.Cast: Zheng Xu, Baoqiang Wang, Bo Huang
4840.Description: Two rival businessmen must track down their boss at a Buddhist temple to secure a patent on a revolutionary new fuel additive. Xu catches the first plane to Bangkok, where his plans are delayed by the happy-go-lucky Wang, an unexpected travel companion who will open Xu's eyes to life's true priorities.

4841.Title: Beneath
4841.Cast: Nora Zehetner, Matthew Settle, Warren Christie
4841.Description: MTV Films presents a horror-thriller that will take you to the depths of darkness and leave you breathless. Christy returns home after the death of her sister Vanessa and is haunted by prophetic visions of violence and murder that begin to come true.

4842.Title: Northmen: A Viking Saga
4842.Cast: Charlie Murphy, Ed Skrein, James Norton, Ryan Kwanten, Tom Hopper, Johan Hegg
4842.Description: When a storm decimates their longboat and strands them behind enemy lines, a crew of Viking raiders must cut through the harsh, unknown territory to reach the safety of a Viking stronghold.

4843.Title: The Real Inglorious Bastards
4843.Cast: Robert Nolan, Patrick O'Donnell, Fred Mayer, Gerald Schwab, John Billings, Ani Weber, Manfred Weber, Steve Shand, Erik Markewich, Sean Connolly Affleck, Shawn Devlin, Owen Bevan, Maarik Pinkney, Ben Davidson, Linzee Barclay
4843.Description: Go to the front lines of World War II in this war documentary, chronicling a group of Jewish agents for the American OSS who infiltrated Nazi territories, many of them German Jews returning to avenge Hitler's sinister acts.

4844.Title: The Ash Lad: In Search of the Golden Castle
4844.Cast: Vebjørn Enger, Eili Harboe, Mads Sjøgård Pettersen, Elias Holmen Sørensen
4844.Description: When the King and Queen are poisoned, brothers Per and Pål are arrested as suspects. Younger brother Espen "The Ash Lad" and Princess Kristin set out on a quest to find the mythical Soria Moria castle, said to be built of pure gold and contain the Water of Life, which can cure Kristin's parents. If they fail, it will spell the end for the brothers, the kingdom, and perhaps the entire world.

4845.Title: Dear Mr. Gacy
4845.Cast: William Forsythe, Jesse Moss, Emma Lahana
4845.Description: A chilling true story about the bizarre correspondence between an ambitious criminology student (Jesse Moss) and John Wayne Gacy (William Forsythe), a convicted serial killer.

4846.Title: Walled In
4846.Cast: Mischa Barton, Darla Biccum, Cameron Bright, Timothy Allen, Eugene Clark
4846.Description: Based on Serge Broselot's bestselling French novel "Les Emmeures," about a demolition company rep who supervises the razing of a mysterious building and discovers horrifying secrets and past inhabitants entombed within its walls by a vicious murderer.

4847.Title: The Turning
4847.Director: Jonathan auf der Heide, Tony Ayres
4847.Cast: Colin Friels, James Peter Fraser, Henri Phillips, Nikita Leigh-Pritchard, Tim Winton
4847.Description: The Turning explores the impact of past on present, how the seemingly random incidents that change and shape us can never be escaped or let go of. All of the stories are bound together by recurring themes; the passing of time, regret, addiction and obsession.

4848.Title: Raatchasi
4848.Cast: Jyotika, Poornima Bhagyaraj, Satyan, Hareesh Peradi
4848.Description: Geetha Rani, the new headmistress of a Government School, has to confront misbehaving students, lethargic faculty and non-existent routines. As she faces these difficulties, will she be able to reform the education system and the society?

4849.Title: Crazy
4849.Cast: Waylon Payne, Ali Larter, Lane Garrison
4849.Description: Inspired by the life of Hank Garland, CRAZY is the story of a legendary guitar player who emerged from Nashville in the 1950's.

4850.Title: Liberty Stands Still
4850.Cast: Wesley Snipes, Linda Fiorentino, Oliver Platt, Tanya Allen, Hart Bochner, Fulvio Cecere, Gregory Calpakis
4850.Description: A gunman ties up an actor and locks him in his dressing room just before a performance. He also puts a bomb with a 90-minute timer next to the actor. Over the next 90 minutes, the story unfolds: as a result of his daughter's death, the gunman wants a public debate on the Second Amendment.

4851.Title: Mine Games
4851.Cast: Joseph Cross, Briana Evigan, Rafi Gavron
4851.Description: A group of friends travel up to a cabin located deep within the forest. Shortly after arriving, they stumble across an abandoned mine and decide to explore the dark and mysterious tunnels. As the group hikes deeper within the mine, they make a shocking discovery that quickly turns their excitement into fear. Hunted by a mysterious force, the group must work together to escape the mine alive.

4852.Title: Next Time I'll Aim for the Heart
4852.Cast: Guillaume Canet, Ana Girardot, Jean-Yves Berteloot, Patrick Azam, Arnaud Henriet
4852.Description: For several months in 1978 and 1979, inhabitants of Oise live in fright and terror as a serial killer disturbs the peace and quiet.

4853.Title: A Night in Old Mexico
4853.Cast: Robert Duvall, Jeremy Irvine, Angie Cepeda
4853.Description: Forced to give up his land and his only home, cantankerous Texas rancher Red Bovie isn't about to go quietly to the dismal trailer park that's all he can now afford, and instead goes off with his grandson Gally - son of his long-estranged son Jimmy - for one last wild and woolly adventure during a night in Old Mexico.

4854.Title: Selah and the Spades
4854.Cast: Lovie Simone, Jharrel Jerome, Celeste O’Connor, Jesse Williams, Gina Torres, Ana Mulvoy Ten, Evan Roe, Francesca Noel, Henry Hunter-Hall, Nekhebet Juch, Bella Ferragamo, Kristen Ivy Haynes, Greyson Cage, Ben Breault, Krish Bhuva, Cody Sloan, Ali Fisher, Rae Bell, Melissa McMeekin, Ken Israel
4854.Description: Five factions run the underground life of the prestigious Haldwell boarding school. At the head of the most powerful faction – THE SPADES – sits Selah Summers. Both charming and callous, Selah walks the fine line between being feared and loved, often cutting loose whomever she deems a threat to her power.

4855.Title: The Capture of the Green River Killer
4855.Cast: Tom Cavanagh, Currie Graham, Amy Davidson, Sharon Lawrence
4855.Description: Starring Tom Cavanagh, Currie Graham, and Amy Davidson. Fate, bad luck, and bad choices propel a young runaway into the path of a notorious serial killer. Based on a true story. The Complete 2-Part Miniseries.

4856.Title: The Guv'nor
4856.Cast: Lenny McLean, Jamie McLean, Guy Ritchie, Jason Flemyng
4856.Description: Donned as "the hardest man in London", this documentary is an extraordinary journey into the brutal brilliance of infamous East End boxer Lenny McClean, also known as the "The Guv'nor". From being a bouncer in London's West End, to life in the ring and his work with acclaimed director Guy Ritchie, McClean's story and journey is told through the eyes of his son Jamie.

4857.Title: Doug Stanhope: No Place Like Home
4857.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Comedy, Special Interest
4857.Description: Doug Stanhope performs live in his hometown of Bisbee, Arizona, tackling an assortment of hard-hitting issues, from caring for the mentally-ill, to Vietnam vets, being locked up abroad and why everyone should kick like they kick. Watch him battle ISIS for the disenfranchised, angry youth.

4858.Title: Saints and Soldiers: Airborne Creed
4858.Cast: Corbin Allred, David Nibley, Jasen Wade
4858.Description: On August 15th, 1944, an invasion in Provence, France was organized by the Americans to support and protect the allied troops marching to Berlin who had already landed in Normandy on June 6, 1944. After jumping over Provence during the night, three paratroopers who have to regroup with their fellow soldiers in the village of Les Arcs, help the local resistance to free some of their members.

4859.Title: Hoodman
4859.Cast: Madison Spear, Brock Morse, Jack James, Skye Roberts, Claire Montgomery
4859.Description: An urban legend haunts a small town as a troubled young woman (Madison Spear) seeks to find her missing child. A relentless detective (Brock Morse) pieces together clues that lead them both to a suspected killer (Jack James).

4860.Title: The Aggression Scale
4860.Cast: Ray Wise, Dana Ashbrook, Derek Mears, Ryan Hartwig, Fabianne Therese
4860.Description: Four heavily armed hitmen and two unusual teenagers go to war over $500,000 of stolen cash.

4861.Title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
4861.Description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

4862.Title: Butchers
4862.Cast: Simon Philllips, Michael Swatton, Julie Mainville, Anne-Carolyne Binette, James Hicks, Nick Allan, Blake Canning, Samantha De Benedet, Frederik Storm, Jonathan Largy
4862.Description: 1998. After the death of their mother, brothers Owen and Oswald Watson are two vicious men left to their own bloody devices in the backcountry. Their twisted fetishes and lust for violence blossom when strangers wander into their dark realm and soon the cleavers are chopping up fresh meat for the wretched flesh-eating creature, they've got locked up with them.

4863.Title: Breaking & Exiting
4863.Cast: Milo Gibson, Jordan Hinson, Adam Huber, Joaquim de Almeida, Justine Wachsberger, James Kyson, Lily Anne Harrison, Cecile Cubilo
4863.Description: During a burglary Harry, a charming house thief, meets Daisy and saves her from herself, sending them into a journey of self discovery and love.

4864.Title: Fukrey Returns
4864.Cast: Pulkit Samrat, Manjot Singh, Ali Fazal, Varun Sharma, Priya Anand, Vishakha Singh, Pankaj Tripathi, Richa Chadha
4864.Description: Fukrey Returns' picks up a year later from where it ended. Having enjoyed the spoils of war they had so audaciously waged, the Fukras are now at crossroads with their past, which is about to decide their future. Bent upon a merciless payback, Bholi Punjaban is back and all set to take the Fukras on a deadly ride.

4865.Title: Last Rampage
4865.Cast: Robert Patrick, Heather Graham, Bruce Davison, Molly Quinn, Chris Browning
4865.Description: The true crime thriller of Gary Tison and Randy Greenawalt's escape from prison and the murderous rampage that followed.

4866.Title: That Uncertain Feeling
4866.Cast: Merle Oberon, Melvyn Douglas, Burgess Meredith, Alan Mowbray, Olive Blakeney, Harry Davenport, Sig Rumann, Eve Arden
4866.Description: Six years into their marriage, Jill Baker (Oberson) contracts a case of recurring hiccups. Her busy husband Larry (Douglas) sends Jill to Freudian psychologist Vengard and he concludes that the hiccups are caused by her marital problems. When Jill meets hilarious but highly neurotic concert pianist Sebastian (Meredith) in the doctor's waiting room, she decides to begin a relationship with Sebastian and file for divorce. Larry, still in love with Jill, initially agrees, but the separation doesn't last long and they reunite after a multitude of hilarious hijinks. Meredith steals the film.

4867.Title: Transpecos
4867.Cast: Johnny Simmons, Gabriel Luna, Clifton Collins, Jr.
4867.Description: For three US Border Patrol agents, the contents of one car reveals a dark secret within their unit that could cost them all their lives. SXSW Grand Jury Award Winner 2016

4868.Title: 23 Blast
4868.Cast: Mark Hapka, Alexa PenaVega, Stephen Lang, Bram Hoover, Max Adler, Becky Ann Baker, Dylan Baker, Kim Zimmer, Timothy Busfield, Fred Dalton Thompson
4868.Description: When a high school football star is suddenly stricken with irreversible total blindness, he must decide whether to live a safe handicapped life or bravely return to the life he once knew and the sport he still loves.

4869.Title: Three Wishes
4869.Cast: Patrick Swayze, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Joseph Mazzello, Seth Mumy
4869.Description: In an unexplained act of charity, Jeanne Holman, picks up an injured, apparent tramp and takes him home to care for him little realising who he was or the effect he would have on her life and those of her family.

4870.Title: Double Whammy
4870.Cast: Denis Leary, Elizabeth Hurley, Steve Buscemi, Chris Noth
4870.Description: A world-weary police detective who fails to stop a fast-food restaurant massacre struggles to regain his departmental reputation, public image, and self-worth.

4871.Title: The Woman Who Wasn't There
4871.Description: Tania Head's jaw-dropping tale of escape from the south tower was the most astounding: the unimaginable hell she witnessed, the injuries she suffered, and the tragic loss of her fiancé, Dave, in the north tower. She rose to national prominence when she became President of the World Trade Center Survivors' Network.

4872.Title: Animal
4872.Cast: Elizabeth Gillies, Joey Lauren Adams, Keke Palmer
4872.Description: A vicious, bloodthirsty predator traps a group of friends (Keke Palmer, Jeremy Sumpter, Elizabeth Gillies) in an isolated cabin.

4873.Title: Finding Altamira
4873.Cast: Antonio Banderas, Golshifteh Farahani, Rupert Everett, Clément Sibony, Henry Goodman, Pierre Niney, Irene Escolar
4873.Description: Life and events of the man who realized one of the most important discoveries of the 19th century: Altamira's caves.

4874.Title: A Dangerous Man
4874.Cast: Steven Seagal, Marlaina Mah, Vitaly Kravchenko
4874.Description: Ex-soldier Shane Daniels is angry. He just spent six years in prison for a crime he didn't commit and lost his wife during the stretch. Then things get even worse, as Shane gets involved in a shootout with the Chinese mob. Now he's on the run, surrounded by violent cops and crime lords. But he's certainly up for the fight.

4875.Title: Running for Grace
4875.Cast: Ryan Potter, Matt Dillon, Jim Caviezel, Olivia Ritchie, Juliet Mills, Nick Boraine, Rumi Oyama
4875.Description: In 1920s Hawaii, a young man of mixed race and the daughter of a white plantation owner must overcome racial and class prejudice to be together.

4876.Title: Running for Grace
4876.Cast: Matt Dillon, Jim Caviezel, Ryan Potter, Olivia Ritchie, Juliet Mills, Nick Boraine, Stelio Savante, Sara Naby Kim, Peyton Dilweg
4876.Description: An orphan boy of mixed race finds family with the newly arrived white village doctor in Hawaii. The boy can run like the wind, and begins bringing Doc's medicine to coffee pickers throughout the mountainous region. On an errand, the medicine runner meets the daughter of the plantation owner and a forbidden, young love blossoms like the white "Kona Snow" of the surrounding coffee trees.

4877.Title: Black Water
4877.Cast: Dolph Lundgren, Jean-Claude Van Damme, Patrick Kilpatrick, Jasmine Waltz
4877.Description: A deep-cover operative (Van Damme) imprisoned on a CIA submarine teams with a fellow prisoner (Lundgren) for an electrifying fight to escape in this action-powered thriller.

4878.Title: Gamera the Brave
4878.Description: A young boy in a peaceful seaside town gets more than he bargained for when he takes home a mysterious egg. When it hatches, out comes a baby turtle that grows into a new version of Gamera. But will it become powerful enough in time to defeat a rampaging monster named Zedus?

4879.Title: Critical Condition
4879.Cast: Richard Pryor, Joe Mantegna, Rachel Ticotin, Ruben Blades, Bob Dishy, Sylvia Miles, Joe Dallesandro, Randall Tex Cobb, Bob Saget, Garrett Morris
4879.Description: Playing a criminal who fakes insanity to avoid prison, Pryor ends up in the hospital psychiatric ward.

4880.Title: Officer Down
4880.Cast: Stephen Dorff, Dominic Purcell, AnnaLynne McCord, David Boreanaz, Stephen Lang, James Wood
4880.Description: A rogue police officer (Stephen Dorff of "Public Enemies") seeks revenge against the men responsible for a string of attacks on the young women working at a local strip club.

4881.Title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
4881.Cast: Elvis Presley, Suzanna Leigh, James Shigeta
4881.Description: Elvis portrays a pilot who runs a local charter helicopter service on the beautiful island of Kauai. A possible suspension of Elvis' pilot's license threatens to destroy his charter company along with all of his financial assets.

4882.Title: The Adventurers
4882.Description: A fighter pilot goes undercover as a member of a crime syndicate to take down the former CIA agent-turned-underworld-crime boss responsible for the deaths of his parents.

4883.Title: Eat With Me
4883.Cast: Sharon Omi, George Takei, Teddy Chen Culver, Nicole Sullivan, Aidan Bristow
4883.Description: When Emma moves in with her estranged gay son, the pair must learn to reconnect through food where words fail, and face the foreclosure of the family's Chinese restaurant and a stubborn fear of intimacy. This directorial debut from David Au offers a fresh take on life, love and food in the heart of Los Angeles through a deliciously emotional and redemptive story supported by an earnest cast.

4884.Title: Be Somebody
4884.Cast: Matthew Espinosa, Sarah Jeffery, Allison Paige, Tava Smiley, Caitlin Keats, LaMonica Garrett, Mahaley Patel, Mason McCulley, Liana Ramirez
4884.Description: To escape the stress of fame, teen pop star Jordan goes incognito in a small town, where he forms a special bond with high school art student Emily.

4885.Title: Be Somebody
4885.Cast: Matt Espinosa, Sarah  Jeffery, Allison Paige
4885.Description: A Pop Superstar Matthew Espinosa eager to escape the burden of fame meets an independent small town girl with big dreams Sarah Jeffery. Together they embark on a unexpected journey of friendship first love and self discovery.

4886.Title: Citizen K
4886.Description: The strange case of Mikhail Khodorkovsky, once believed to be the wealthiest man in Russia, who rocketed to prosperity and prominence in the 1990s, served a decade in prison, and became an unlikely martyr for the anti-Putin movement.

4887.Title: Can't Stand Losing You: Surviving The Police
4887.Description: Based on the memoir by guitarist Andy Summers, Can't Stand Losing You tells of the rise of The Police. From chance encounters with Copeland and Sting, through the band's break up, Summers shares photos and memories as they prepare for a reunion.

4888.Title: Love Everlasting
4888.Cast: Lucky Blue Smith, Emily Procter, Christie Burke
4888.Description: High school senior Bridger (Lucky Blue Smith) in an escape from his abusive stepfather, ends up stuck in a small middle-of-nowhere town. He soon meets fellow outcast Clover, and sparks fly.

4889.Title: M.O.M. Mothers of Monsters
4889.Cast: Melinda Page Hamilton, Ed Asner, Bailey Edwards
4889.Description: A distraught mother suspects her teenage son is a psychopath who may shoot up his high school, but when he outsmarts the system, she is forced to take matters into her own hands.

4890.Title: Meet Monica Velour
4890.Cast: Kim Cattrall, Dustin Ingram, Brian Dennehy, Keith David
4890.Description: An awkward teen heads cross-country to meet Monica Velour, his favorite '80s porn star, at a rare live appearance. Kim Cattrall gives a career-defining performance as the aging sexpot.

4891.Title: Netflix vs. the World
4891.Cast: Derek Cecil, Kevin Costner, Alfonso Cuaron, Antoine Fuqua, Woody Harrelson
4891.Description: Two decades before there was a streaming war, a tiny, broke Silicon Valley company that rented DVDs by mail laid the foundation for a revolution in how the world watches entertainment today.

4892.Title: Thank God It's Friday
4892.Cast: Donna Summer, Jeff Goldblum, Debra Winger, Lionel Richie, Terri Nunn, Mews Small, Chick Vennera, Valerie Landsburg
4892.Description: A Friday in the life of the disco club the Zoo, where the staff and clients meet and dance their their lives away.

4893.Title: Bunty Aur Babli
4893.Cast: Abhishek Bachchan, Rani Mukerji, Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Kiran Juneja, Puneet Issar
4893.Description: Rakesh (Abhishek Bachchan) is a man of schemes, ideas, invention and restlessness. Small town girl, Vimmi (Rani Mukerji) doesn’t want to become just another marriageable girl. Somewhere along their individual journey, they meet and in a moment of mistaken truth, the legend of Bunty and Babli is born. We follow the duo gig after gig, hiding from an upset policeman, Dashrath Singh (Amitabh Bachchan)

4894.Title: Jack Goes Home
4894.Cast: Rory Culkin, Britt Robertson, Natasha Lyonne
4894.Description: After his father is killed in a car crash, Jack travels home to Colorado to help nurse his mother (who was injured in the crash) back to health. There, he uncovers long buried secrets and lies within his family history, his parents, his friends and his very identity.

4895.Title: Cold Case
4895.Cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran, Lakshmipriya Chandramouli, Anil Nedumangadu, Athmiya Rajan
4895.Description: Cold Case is a hybrid genre film of a crime investigation story and a horror story running parallel. Sathyajith, Assistant Commissioner of Police, along with his team is assigned to handle controversial and complicated cases. One day, while fishing on a lake side, a man finds a garbage bag trapped inside his net.The story revolves how the ACP investigate the case and find out the killer.

4896.Title: Brick Lane
4896.Cast: Tannishtha Chatterjee, Satish Kaushik, Christopher Simpson, Harvey Virdi
4896.Description: A young Bangladeshi woman, Nazneen, arrives in 1980s London, leaving behind her beloved sister and home, for an arranged marriage and a new life. Trapped within the four walls of her flat in East London, and in a loveless marriage with the middle aged Chanu, Nazneen struggles to accept her new life. Then one day, the hotheaded young Karim comes knocking at her door.

4897.Title: Hanover Street
4897.Cast: Harrison Ford, Lesley-Anne Down, Christopher Plummer, Alec McCowen, Richard Masur, Michael Sacks, Patsy Kensit, John Ratzenberger, Jay Benedict
4897.Description: In this WWII romance, David Halloran (Harrison Ford) is an American bomber pilot stationed in London. During an air raid, Halloran meets and falls in love with beautiful Briton Margaret Sellinger (Lesley-Anne Down) even though Margaret is married.

4898.Title: Jack Frost
4898.Cast: Christopher Allport, Scott MacDonald, Shannon Elizabeth
4898.Description: A serial killer is transformed into an evil snowman in this 90’s camp horror favorite.

4899.Title: Recoil
4899.Cast: Steve Austin, Serinda Swan, Danny Trejo
4899.Description: After the murder of his family, former cop John Varrett goes vigilante in order find the criminals that have slipped through the system and exercise his own brand of ruthless justice.

4900.Title: Trafficked
4900.Cast: Ashley Judd, Elisabeth Röhm, Sean Patrick Flanery, Kelly Washington, Jessica Obilom, Alpa Banker, Anne Archer, Patrick Duffy
4900.Description: In this story inspired by real characters, three girls from America, Nigeria and India are trafficked through an elaborate global network and enslaved in a Texas brothel, and must together attempt a daring escape to reclaim their freedom.

4901.Title: Lone Star State of Mind
4901.Cast: Joshua Jackson, Jaime King, Matthew Davis, Ryan Hurst, John Mellencamp, DJ Qualls, Sam McMurray, Thomas Haden Church, Ellar Coltrane, Larry Hovis
4901.Description: Earl's engaged to his step-sister Baby. Baby has entrusted him to take care of her misfit cousin Junior. Baby is also intent on leaving Texas for LA on Tuesday. When Junior and his recently released ex-con friend Tinker rob a pizza delivery boy and end up with $20,000 of drug money Earl is forced onto the scene, giving up his and Baby's LA money to save Juniors limbs.

4902.Title: Tough Guy: The Bob Probert Story
4902.Cast: Bob Probert, Joe Kocur, Don Cherry, Tie Domi, Jeremy Roenick, Chris Chelios
4902.Description: An intimate portrait of legendary NHL tough guy Bob Probert told through exclusive interviews with his family, friends, teammates and rivals, featuring game footage, news reports, and never before seen home movies.

4903.Title: Mulberry Street
4903.Description: The city that never sleeps may shut its eyes for good when a deadly infection turns its residents to savage creatures. There is only hope for a small few, including six recently evicted tenants who must protect their crumbling apartment complex as the city around them is thrown into chaos.

4904.Title: American Mobster: Retribution
4904.Cast: Nino Cimino, Chris Spinelli, Elliott Woods, James Menditto, Jason Toler, Gio Randazzo, Sal Landi, Johnny Mask, Lou Tapia, Nicole D'Angelo, Jeffrey Moon, Adam Weston Poell, Giorgio Bellossi, Jeff Rector, Alexa Niemi, David Prak, Louis DeStefano, Craijece Danielle, Talon Tears, Akia Takara, Doug Tochioka, Taylor Anne Swartz, Perry Meth, Warren Hong
4904.Description: Nick Romano must navigate through murder, violence, and betrayal in order to maintain his place as the top mobster in Miami.

4905.Title: The Ghost Army
4905.Description: The Ghost Army was officially known as the 23rd Headquarters Special Troops. From June 1944 to March 1945 it staged 20 battlefield deceptions, beginning in Normandy and ending at the Rhine River.

4906.Title: Lost Child
4906.Cast: Leven Rambin, Jim Parrack, Landon Edwards, Taylor John Smith
4906.Description: An army veteran returns home to find her brother, only to discover a lost boy in the woods behind her home. After taking him in, she discovers local folklore about a lifedraining spirit that comes in the form of a child; the Tatterdemalion.

4907.Title: Within Our Gates
4907.Description: Abandoned by her fiance, an educated negro woman with a shocking past dedicates herself to helping a near bankrupt school for impoverished negro youths.

4908.Title: Gintama
4908.Cast: Shun Oguri, Masami Nagasawa, Takayuki Yamada, Kôichi Yamadera
4908.Description: Set in the Edo shogunate where power of samurai is on decline as the aliens from outer space have invaded the country and outlawed their swords, it portrays the life of a handyman Gintoki Sakata, whom still carries the heart of a samurai.

4909.Title: Beautiful
4909.Cast: Minnie Driver, Joey Lauren Adams, Hallie Eisenberg, Kathleen Turner, Kathleen Robertson, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras, Michael McKean, Julie Condra, Jessica Collins, Shawn Christian, Landry Allbright, Leslie Stefanson
4909.Description: Headstrong Mona Hubbard (Minnie Driver) is a fiercely driven woman with only one goal: to capture the coveted "Miss American Miss" beauty award. Helping her is Mona's childhood friend and consummate nurturer Ruby and Ruby's daughter Vanessa. But as the pageant looms closer, Mona starts to think whether her sacrifices of family, in pursuit of a beauty pageant victory, was worth it?

4910.Title: Tenderness
4910.Description: Russell Crowe stars as a strong, quiet detective determined to unravel the past to discover the truth about a violent young man released from prison.

4911.Title: Eternal Beauty
4911.Cast: Sally Hawkins, David Thewlis, Billie Piper, Penelope Wilton, Morfydd Clark, Robert Pugh, Alice Lowe, Robert Aramayo
4911.Description: When Jane (Sally Hawkins) is dumped at the altar she has a breakdown and spirals into a chaotic world, where love (both real and imagined) and family relationships collide with both touching and humorous consequences.

4912.Title: Desert Blue
4912.Cast: Casey Affleck, Brendan Sexton III, Kate Hudson, Christina Ricci, John Heard, Ethan Suplee, Sara Gilbert, Isidra Vega, Peter Sarsgaard
4912.Description: When cable TV starlet Skye gets stuck in a tiny Californian town, the last thing she wants to do is get to know the eccentric local teens. When a mysterious chemical spill forces the FBI to put the town under quarantine Skye has no choice but to stay put. When she starts to fall in love with loner Blue she realizes she might not be in such a rush to get back to the big city after all.

4913.Title: Dear God
4913.Cast: Greg Kinnear, Laurie Metcalf, Maria Pitillo
4913.Description: Special delivery for comedy fans! Greg Kinnear ( Auto Focus) stars in and Garry Marshall ( Pretty Woman) directs this spirit-lifter about a money-scamming con artist who goes from no-good to doing good.

4914.Title: Wild Horses
4914.Cast: Robert Duvall, James Franco, Josh Hartnett
4914.Description: A detective opens up a fifteen-year-old missing persons case, and begins to suspect that the missing boy was murdered, and that a local rancher was involved.

4915.Title: Chasers
4915.Cast: Tom Berenger, William McNamara, Erika Eleniak, Crispin Glover
4915.Description: A hapless Navy sailor is assigned SP duty. The catch: he must escort a beautiful female prisoner on her way to prison for going UA. She in turn will try anything to escape.

4916.Title: Extracurricular Activities
4916.Cast: Colin Ford, Ellie Bamber, Timothy Simons, Bobby Lee, Angela Kinsey
4916.Description: Reagan Collins is a model high school student with a killer after school job. He arranges accidents.When his classmates' parents become too overbearing, self-obsessed, or just plain inconvenient, Reagan offers to off them for a price.

4917.Title: Tanner Hall
4917.Cast: Amy Ferguson, Amy Sedaris, Brie Larson, Chris Kattan, Georgia King, Rooney Mara, Tom Everett Scott
4917.Description: Rooney Mara stars in this coming of age drama about love, friendship, and heartbreak, set in an elite New England private school. Also stars Tom Everett Scott, Chris Kattan, and Amy Sedaris.

4918.Title: The Corrupted
4918.Cast: Sam Claflin, Timothy Spall, David Hayman, Noel Clarke, Charlie Murphy, Naomi Ackie, Joe Claflin, Sam Otto, Cathal Pendred, Hugh Bonneville
4918.Description: Liam McDonagh (Sam Claflin), an ex-con attempting to live a peaceful life is thrust into action when his brother becomes entangled in a dangerous web of corruption. Liam must risk it all to save his family.

4919.Title: The Island on Bird Street
4919.Cast: Patrick Bergin, Jordan Kiziuk, Jack Warden
4919.Description: Alex is an 11-year old boy who, during WWII, hides in the Jewish ghetto from Nazis after all the relatives have been sent to the concentration camp

4920.Title: Domain
4920.Cast: Britt Lower, Ryan Merriman, William Gregory Lee, Kevin Sizemore, Nick Gomez
4920.Description: After a deadly virus wipes out most of humanity, the survivors are forced to wait in self-sustaining bunkers with a networked video interface for communication, but one by one, they start mysteriously disappearing.

4921.Title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
4921.Cast: Danny Trejo, Danny Glover, Andrew Divoff, Jacqueline Obradors, Elizabeth Barondes
4921.Description: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) teams up with grumpy old agoraphobic Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) to kick ass and clean up the streets of L.A.

4922.Title: Social Animals
4922.Description: This documentary follows a trio of teens – a daredevil photographer, an aspiring model and a lonely Ohio girl – and Instagram's impact on their lives.

4923.Title: Social Animals
4923.Cast: Noel Wells, Josh Radnor, Aya Cash, Carly Chaikin, Fortune Feimster, Samira Wiley
4923.Description: This honest, uncompromising comedy chronicles the war stories and sexual misadventures of a tight circle of lovers and friends fighting to get their acts together, for better or worse.

4924.Title: Primal Rage
4924.Cast: Andrew Joseph Montgomery, Casey Gagliardi, Eloy Casados, Marshal Hilton, Justin Rain
4924.Description: Lost deep in the forest of the Pacific Northwest, Ashley and Max Carr are stalked by a terrifying creature that might be Bigfoot. Soon they find themselves embroiled in a strange land of Native American myth and legend turned real. Hopelessly trying to survive, with a handful of unsavory locals, they must fight back against this monster in a desperate battle of life or death. You Will Believe!

4925.Title: A Mother's Nightmare
4925.Cast: Annabeth Gish, Jessica Lowndes, Grant Gustin
4925.Description: A recently divorced woman is thrilled when her teenage son is smitten with the new girl in school. Her happiness is short-lived when she discovers her son's new love interest has left a string of dead boyfriends in her wake.

4926.Title: The Gracefield Incident
4926.Cast: Mathieu Ratthe, Victor Andres Turgeon-Trelles, Kimberly Laferriere
4926.Description: In Gracefield, three couples are spending a long weekend in a luxurious cabin when suddenly an uninvited guest in the form of a meteorite, comes crashing the party...

4927.Title: The Music of Silence
4927.Cast: Toby Sebastian, Luisa Ranieri, Jordi Mollà, Antonio Banderas, Ennio Fantastichini, Nadir Caselli, Alessandro Sperduti, Francesco Salvi
4927.Description: Based on the autobiography by tenor Andrea Bocelli, this musical biopic chronicles his life from his bumpy childhood to his meteoric rise to fame.

4928.Title: The Music of Silence
4928.Cast: Antonio Banderas, Jordi Mollà, Luisa Ranieri, Toby Sebastian
4928.Description: Based on the extraordinary true story of Andrea Bocelli, a blind boy, who against all odds, becomes one of the most world renowned opera singers.

4929.Title: Train
4929.Cast: Todd Jensen, Kavan Reece, Derek Magyar, Gloria Votsis, Gideon Emery, Thora Birch, Zahary Baharov
4929.Description: In Europe, a group of American college athletes unknowingly board a train that will become one deadly ride.

4930.Title: The Benefactor
4930.Cast: Richard Gere, Dakota Fanning, Theo James
4930.Description: A newly married couple are forced to navigate the all-consuming interest of a powerful, mysterious, and possessive philanthropist.

4931.Title: Arsenal
4931.Cast: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, Adrian Grenier, Johnathon Schaech, Lydia Hull, Abbie Gayle
4931.Description: Family loyalty is tested in this ferocious thriller about a successful businessman willing to do anything for his deadbeat - brother including tracking down the vicious mobster holding him hostage.

4932.Title: Posse
4932.Cast: Kirk Douglas, Bruce Dern, Bo Hopkins
4932.Description: A tough marshal with political ambitions leads an elite posse to capture a notorious criminal. He succeeds, but instead of cheering him, the public turns against him.

4933.Title: Sharknado 5: Global Swarming
4933.Cast: Ian Ziering, Tara Reid, Cassandra Scerbo, Billy Barratt
4933.Description: With much of North America lying in ruins, the rest of the world braces for the inevitable: a global sharknado. From London to Asia, South Africa to Mexico, Fin and his family must put a stop to the sharknados once and for all.

4934.Title: Ghost House
4934.Cast: Scout Taylor-Compton, James Landry Hébert, Mark Boone Junior, Michael S. New, Russell Geoffrey Banks, Rich Lee Gray, Elana Krausz, Kevin Ragsdale, Wen-Chu Yang, Katrina Grey
4934.Description: While visiting the site of a supernatural shrine in the Thai countryside, a vacationing couple unwittingly upsets a vengeful demon.

4935.Title: Beyond the Edge
4935.Cast: Antonio Banderas, Milos Bikovic, Lyubov Aksenova, Yuriy Chursin, Evgeny Stychkin, Aristarkh Venes
4935.Description: Set in Moscow, Russia, a talented gambler gathers a team of con artists with supernatural powers to win big at a casino. But, their plan unravels when they encounter a stronger mystical rival.

4936.Title: Dishonored Lady
4936.Cast: Hedy Lamarr, Dennis O'Keefe, John Loder, William Lundigan, Morris Carnovsky, Natalie Schafer, Paul Cavanagh, Douglass Dumbrille, Margaret Hamilton, Ransom M. Sherman, Gino Corrado, James Flavin, Nicholas Joy, Reid Kilpatrick, Fred Kohler Jr., Dewey Robinson, Harry Strang, Kam Tong, Archie Twitchell, Robert Williams, Ian Wolfe
4936.Description: A fashion editor and lively party girl is implicated in a murder of an ex-suitor

4937.Title: Once Upon a Time in London
4937.Cast: Leo Gregory, Terry Stone, Doug Allen, Andy Beckwith, Kate Braithwaite, Holly Earl, Joe Egan, Nadia Forde
