In this all-new stand-up special, Sasheer covers a spectrum of topics, from drugs to relationships, racism to politics - nothing is off limits. This multi-talented comedian incorporates different performance elements to express her opinions and dive into her personal life, truly giving you a piece of her mind.

6190.Title: Tartarus
6190.Cast: Juan Fernandez, Michelle Hanna, Sarah Lakshmi
6190.Description: A man's surreal, nightmarish descent into madness.

6191.Title: Dancing Ninja
6191.Cast: Lucas Grabeel, David Hasselhoff, Bree Turner, Gary Hudson
6191.Description: An orphaned boy who dreams of being a ninja arrives in Hollywood to try and find his birth parents but gets mixed up in a crime.

6192.Title: Templar Nation
6192.Cast: Erik Estrada, Richard Dutcher, Joseph James, Cristina Segovia, Todd Frost, Natalie Paige WillisonSegovia,  Todd Frost,  Natalie Paige Willison
6192.Description: After an archaeologist and his students excavate a Templar Knight's tomb, they are thrown into the middle of an ancient blood feud. They must either follow the Templar's ancient path or face destruction at the hands of a dark league of assassin.

6193.Title: Claudia Oshry: Disgraced Queen
6193.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Comedy, Young Adult Audience
6193.Description: As Instagram's reigning disgraced queen, Claudia Oshry is taking on pop culture, and all that's wrong with it, in an outrageous new stand-up special.

6194.Title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Camping!
6194.Cast: Martin Short, Alexa Torrington, Jacob Ewaniuk, Rob Tinkler
6194.Description: It's the first day of Summer Vacation and The Cat in the Hat whisks Nick, Sally and Fish off on the greatest great outdoor camping adventure ever! Our gang gets back to nature as they hike through the Fickle Fern Forest, camp out overnight, trek over Mt. Weewobble and canoe down the Tickle Drop River.

6195.Title: Italy's Mystery Mountains
6195.Description: From PBS - Two teams of scientists explore the fascinating geologic story of Italy: the continuously erupting volcanoes, the violent earthquakes, and the clash of mighty tectonic plates. If they can determine if the northern Apennines are still alive and growing, they might better understand where future earthquakes might strike this highly unstable land.

6196.Title: The Yousers
6196.Cast: Don Snipes, Lulu Dahl, Deborah Chenualt Green
6196.Description: A wife's suspicion about her husbands infidelity turns into an obsession for the woman he is suspected of cheating with.

6197.Title: Mummy Dearest
6197.Cast: Tara Reid, Michael Paré, Lou Ferrigno, Richard Tyson, Nikki Leigh, Quinton Aaron, Ken Davitian
6197.Description: After an injury puts Scarlett Healy in a wheelchair, she moves in with her daughter, Autumn, who just moved into a creepy old house with her boyfriend, Frank Thrussel.

6198.Title: 1/2 New Year
6198.Cast: Shanley Caswell, Jeff Dye, Rome Flynn, Marc Gordon, Alexis Iacono, John Lerardi, Afton Jillian, Brooke Lewis, Jermaine Alverez Martin, Drew McAnany, Amy Paffrath, Ashley Platz, Matt Schulte, Rebecca Vinargo, Bo Youngblood
6198.Description: At their annual 1/2 New Year Party, relationships are tested among a group of friends.

6199.Title: Evan Straw
6199.Cast: Lorna Nogueira, Christine Grudenkis, Michael Legge, Dwight Kemper, Danielle Gelehrter
6199.Description: Alice Marsh moves far from home to start a new life. She falls in love with an old house in Massachusetts which she buys. As time goes on, strange things start to happen to Alice. Is the previous owner's ghost still in the house?

6200.Title: Drastic Measures
6200.Cast: Christian Velky, Marikah Cunningham, Cody Laper, Shadia Martin
6200.Description: An estranged husband and wife attempt to rekindle their marriage by taking a vacation at a cabin in the woods. But they soon find themselves in a dangerous situation when another couple unexpectedly appears.

6201.Title: Terror at Bigfoot Pond
6201.Description: Terror at Bigfoot Pond tells the story of a diverse cast of seven college students, three of them couples, who go camping just after their first year at college lets out. Throughout the long night, they are killed off one at a time by Bigfoot, until only one, Kelly, remains.

6202.Title: Snitch'd
6202.Cast: James Cahill, Eva Longoria, Oleg Zatsepin, Chad Bendele, Brenda Tinoca
6202.Description: When the South Side Gang and the Cut Throat Mafia start a drug war at a local high school, detective McClure goes undercover to investigate the brutal murder of a young Latina student. The gang members are the key suspects but nobody is talking. And as McClure continues to dig for answers, it becomes clear that the two gangs are fighting for territory - and nobody is getting in their way.

6203.Title: Pink Heat
6203.Cast: Jordan Burgess, Adam Joseph Lopez, Joey Catalano, James Howey, Nick Catalano, Henry Frost III
6203.Description: For her birthday this year, Elizabeth has been given two pink pistols and a reason to use them when a gang of vicious criminals murders her grandfather in cold blood. Packing her trusted pink heat, Elizabeth sets out to avenge her family, leaving a trail of bullet-riddled bodies in her wake.

6204.Title: The Reunited States
6204.Cast: Van Jones, Susan Bro, Meghan McCain
6204.Description: The Reunited States is a powerful and urgent documentary that follows the unsung heroes on the difficult journey of bridging our political and racial divides. Presented by Van Jones and Meghan McCain

6205.Title: Zabardast
6205.Cast: Pushkar Jog, Manasi Naik, Sanjay Narvekar, Makarand Anaspure, Kishori Ambiye, Priya Berde, Abhiram Bhadkamkar, Vijay Chavan, Bharat Jadhav, Siddarth Jadhav, Rasika Joshi, Mahesh Kothare, Santosh Pawar, Aditya Redij, Sanjiv Talpade, Sunil Tawde, Yohana Vachhani
6205.Description: Pushkar finds a magic coat that fulfils wishes once someone wears it. Using it, he decides to impress the girl he loves and enter a dance reality show with her. Will he win the competition?

6206.Title: Tusks
6206.Cast: Lucy Gutteridge, Andrew Stevens, John Rhys-Davies
6206.Description: An unhinged poacher who makes his living off the ivory trade is challenged by a game warden, who happens to be his former old friend, and a female animal conservationist. The poacher snaps and decides to kill them both.

6207.Title: Captain Calamity
6207.Cast: Marian Nixon, George Houston, Vince Barnett, Juan Torena, Movita, Crane Wilbur, George J. Lewis, Roy D'Arcy, Margaret Irving, Barry Norton, Louis Natheaux, Lloyd Ingraham, Alberto Gandero, Harold Howard, Charles Moyer, Gordon Jones, Maria Kalamo
6207.Description: In the South Seas, Captain Bill Jones (Houston) of the schooner "Marigold", who also known as Captain Calamity for his propensity for getting into fights, is broke and in need of re-stocking on the island of Quica.

6208.Title: The Young Land
6208.Cast: Pat Wayne, Yvonne Craig, Dennis Hopper, Dan O'Herlihy, Roberto De La Madrid
6208.Description: In 1848 in California, an American (Hopper) is placed on trial for killing a Mexican. Mexican-Americans are anxious to see if the American justice system treats everyone equally. After the trial the young sheriff (Wayne), who had arrested him, has to save him from being lynched.

6209.Title: Any Last Words?
6209.Cast: Dimitrius Pulido, Paul Tinder, Scott Jefferies, John Kublank, Tom Lagleder, Scott Rocco, Milo Shephenson
6209.Description: Inspired by the life of Bat Masterson. After a violent war one man finds himself shot. As he lies there he's left to make his toughest choice, whether to live or die.

6210.Title: A Box of Faith
6210.Description: Alone and on her own, sixteen-year-old Dior figures out how to survive on the streets by the stroke of a spiritual pen.

6211.Title: 18 Vayasu
6211.Description: Johnny acts like the first animal he comes across whenever he is depressed. He meets Gayathri, an orphan, who is harassed by her caretaker, while he is ill-treated by his mother. After a shocking event Johnny must try to win back Gayathri's love.

6212.Title: Konga TNT
6212.Description: After becoming injected with a formula derived from an alien ship, a lab gorilla escapes from his containment and befriends two young boys. The alien formula causes the gorilla to grow to gargantuan size and rampage throughout the city and the boys must find a way to save their simian friend before the army takes him down.

6213.Title: Marital Problems
6213.Cast: Nick Capper, Callum Gault, Aleis Duffy, Neil Goldsmith, Jonathan Hearns
6213.Description: On the eve of his eviction, Ian's home becomes invaded by Clarke, an unscrupulous gardener who recounts the events of his failed marriage in an attempt to bring closure to Ian's prior engagement that failed to go the distance.

6214.Title: Forbidden Secrets
6214.Cast: Kristy Swanson, David Kelley, Christopher Bondy, Charles Powell, Marianne Farley
6214.Description: Alexandra, in the midst of a divorce from her controlling husband Dan, moves back into her family home with the help of an old friend of the family and psychiatrist; Sam. She has not been back home since she was six years old, to the place where tragedy struck her mother and beloved aunt. Haunted by her memories of the past, strange things begin happening.

6215.Title: Arrest Bulldog Drummond
6215.Cast: John Howard, Heather Angel, Reginald Denny, George Zucco, E.E. Clive, H.B. Warner, Jean Fenwick
6215.Description: Bulldog Drummond's (Howard) honeymoon with his long-time love Phyllis (Angel) is delayed when Drummond is framed for the theft of a deadly atomic disintegrator, meant to disarm the world by its pacifist inventor, but being untilized for evil. Drummond manages to elude the police, and with his usual band of friends and associates, goes after the real crooks: Rolf Alferson (Zucco), his girlfriend in crime Lady Beryl Ledyard (Fenwick), and his gang of dastardly goons. The last in the Bulldog Drummond series of movies.

6216.Title: Brash Boys Club
6216.Cast: Owen Alabado, Dash Kwiatkowski, Brad Loekle
6216.Genres: Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Comedy, LGBTQ
6216.Description: Brash Boys Club, one-night of stand-up, gay comedy featuring three diverse comedians each doing a half-hour set.

6217.Title: Return of the Tiger
6217.Description: The most brutal action packed martial arts battle of the decade, Bruce Li, The Roaring Kung Tiger, faces his deadliest enemy.. the vicious and sadistic torturer from The Midnight Express. The Hoover Night Club in Bangkok is used to coverup the operations of the international narcotics group headed by an American, George Cross.

6218.Title: Border Blues
6218.Cast: Eric Roberts, Gary Busey, Erik Estrada
6218.Description: A dangerous smuggler helps an attractive woman and her 5-year-old daughter, while a police chief pursues a mad bomber in Los Angeles

6219.Title: Hollow Scream
6219.Cast: Ann McCaskey, Arianna Guerra, Brian Beacock, Elizabeth Maxwell, Harold Fisch, Joe Barajas, Jordan Brinkman, Kevin Brown, Lara Shah, Marcelle Purdy, Nicole Moore, Oryan Landa, Shannon Lepard
6219.Description: A narcissistic playboy entrepreneur with a dark past plays a new virtual reality game where he gets to be a serial killer. His genius brother discovers the dangerous truth behind the game and its creators.

6220.Title: Payback
6220.Cast: Matt Levett, Toby Leonard Moore, Anna Baryshnikov, Lev Gorn, Rade Servedzija, Elena Satine
6220.Description: A young stockbroker at a Mob-controlled Wall Street firm gets betrayed and sent to prison for six years. When he gets out, his quest for vengeance makes him a target of the Russian mafia.

6221.Title: Clay
6221.Cast: Imelda Staunton, Ian McElhinney, Ben-Ryan Davies, Harry McEntire
6221.Description: Adapted by Peter Tabern from the award-winning novel by David Almond and set in 1960s Tyneside, this is the dark and mesmerizing tale of how Davie Hagan's life is changed forever by a mysterious stranger called Stephen Rose. Beguiled by Stephen's gift to mold clay figures and bring them to life, Davie quickly falls under his spell.

6222.Title: All Babes Want To Kill Me
6222.Cast: Colin Miller, Gianni Lazuli, Alex Cain
6222.Description: A Martial Artist, afflicted with a disease that makes beautiful women want to kill him, goes on a suicide mission to find true love anyway.

6223.Title: Bank Alarm
6223.Cast: Conrad Nagel, Eleanor Hunt, Vince Barnett, Wheeler Oakman, Nat Carr, Frank Milan
6223.Description: Federal agents Alan O'Connor (Nagel) and Bobbie Reynolds (Hunt) are hot on the trail of a vicious gang of bank robbers, who have a habit of leaving corpses along their destructive path. Making their investigation easier is the fact that these robbers also killed an old counterfeiter and stole his entire stash of counterfeit money, and the gang unwittingly leaves a trail of counterfeit cash for the agents to follow. However, time is of the essense for this G-Man and G-Woman to find and follow all the clues to the gang, before still more innocent people die in the robbers newest plan. Last in the series of mysteries starring Conrad Nagel and Eleanor Hunt together.

6224.Title: Tom Clancy's The Division: Agent Origins
6224.Cast: Matt Lynch, Sasha Andreev, Amanda Day, Danny Mason
6224.Description: New York City teeters on the brink of collapse after being devastated by a pandemic. Four newly activated agents of a secret organization called The Division must leave their old lives behind to prevent the fall of civilization. Tom Clancy's The Division™: Agent Origins, inspired by the groundbreaking video game by Ubisoft®.

6225.Title: Rebel: Loreta Velazquez, Secret Soldier of the American Civil War
6225.Description: At the outset of the American Civil War, Loreta Janeta Velazquez, an educated Cuban born teenager, fought as an officer in the battle of First Bull Run, was wounded at Shiloh, and served as a secret agent for the Confederacy. By 1863, Velazquez was spying for the Union.

6226.Title: Pure the movie series
6226.Cast: Duece King, John Stover, LaMar Mackey, Fonz Carter, Born Love, Lonette Carr, Mr 716 Big Miz
6226.Description: Pure an action packed movie-series about the streets of Buffalo New York. The first part of this drama identifies with a hustler named Nevada who is wise beyond his years. After robbing one of the city's most respected gangsters, he and his crew had a plan to take over but in order to do so, they must work for the enemy.

6227.Title: Paddle to the Ocean
6227.Description: Musician Zac Crouse begins his 82-day sea kayak journey from the Ottawa Valley back home to Halifax, Nova Scotia. Crouse paddles through class IV rapids and tidal bores, down four major rivers and across the Bay of Fundy while touring his new solo album. Zac will be filming Paddle to the Ocean with the help of professional white-water kayaker/documentary film-maker Kelsey Thompson.

6228.Title: Josh Blue: Broccoli
6228.Description: Josh Blue dives deep in his newest Comedy Special, Broccoli, exploring the craziest of topics. From discussing the ghosts of the past, those in his home, and the future of his Comedy, you will surely be rolling in laughter.

6229.Title: ETs Among Us 3: Secret Space Program, Alien Psychics & Crop Circle Clues
6229.Cast: Robert Dean, Linda Moulton Howe, Robert Morningstar, Nick Pope, Richard Dolan, Nikos Alexacos
6229.Description: Episode 3 in Cybela Clare's award-winning "ETs Among Us" series covers even more uncharted territory: a top secret space program run by humans, alien telepathy and human/ET communicators/translators, and new areas of the alien abduction phenomenon. Award-winning researcher Linda Moulton Howe reveals surprising clues, analyzing the ongoing and decades-long worldwide crop circle phenomenon.

6230.Title: Kindness Matters
6230.Cast: Bill Wetherill, Aaron Ginn-Forsberg, Raine Hartman Forsberg, Julie Van Lith, Stacie Stocker, Suzanne McGown Brown, Kathleen Benner, Greg Lutz, Timothy Helmstadter, Shellie Ulrich, Benjamin Charles Fletcher
6230.Description: A little boy named Lincoln, who is bullied for the way he talks, creates a superhero in his head. A lonely man rescues a puppy who transforms his life and falls in love. This inspiring story illustrates how kindness can truly make a difference. From the creator of the hit faith and spirituality movie "A Box of Faith" comes this family movie of inspiration.

6231.Title: Nature: Touching the Wild: Living with the Mule Deer of Deadman Gulch
6231.Description: From PBS - Joe Hutto's remarkable ability to interact with wild creatures was previously portrayed in the award-winning NATURE film, My Life as a Turkey. His new wild family is made up of mule deer living high in the mountains near his home in Wyoming, and the extraordinary story of how he became one of them pushes once again at the boundaries of how we perceive wild animals.

6232.Title: Corrie ten Boom: A Faith Undefeated
6232.Description: When Nazi forces invaded Holland in 1940 and began rounding up Jews, Corrie ten Boom, her sister Betsie, and their elderly father risked their lives to save as many as possible. Corrie ten Boom: a Faith Undefeated recounts this unforgettable story for a new generation.

6233.Title: I Love Toy Trains - Ticket to Ride
6233.Description: One of the best-selling kid series in the country. Parents' Choice award winner. Rave reviews in the national media. See real and toy trains in action - a large outdoor G-gauge exhibit, "oh no" bloopers and the toe-tapping music of James Coffey.

6234.Title: Stevie Ray Vaughan - 1984-1989: Lonestar
6234.Description: This film traces and reveals The Full, Previously Un-Told Story Of Stevie Ray Vaughan's Glory Years, the period between the release of his debut album and his tragic death in a helicopter crash in 1989.

6235.Title: Kacche Dhaagey
6235.Cast: Yograj Singh, Nitu Pandher, Deep Mandian, Shreya Chawla, Jagpal Singh Chahal, Jyoti Sharma, Janak Joshi, Karan Vinayak
6235.Description: While visiting India for her cousin's wedding, a Canadian girl develops strong feelings for a boy from a lower caste.

6236.Title: Kacche Dhaagey
6236.Cast: Deep Mandian, Shreyaa Chawla, Yograj Singh, Nitu Pandher, Jatinder kaur, Gurpreet Bhangu, Jyoti Sharma
6236.Description: A Canadian-born girl who visits India to attend her cousin's wedding. While there, she meets and falls in love with a boy from a lower class status, much to the chagrin of her upper-class family.

6237.Title: UFOTV Presents: Out of the Blue - The Definitive Investigation On UFOs
6237.Description: Narrated by Peter Coyote, Out of The Blue is widely considered the best documentary ever made about Unidentified Objects. The producers traveled around the world to investigate some of the most famous UFO events on record. Through exclusive interviews with high-ranking military and government personnel, this award-winning film supports the theory that some UFOs are of extraterrestrial origin.

6238.Title: Truck Tunes 2
6238.Description: From the creators of the original Truck Tunes come ten more songs about ten more cool trucks! These music videos will have you dancing and singing along with all the fun. Songs include, "Dump It Dump Truck", "Clean Up Like a Vacuum Truck", "Call Him a Monster Truck", and many more! Kids of all ages will love these videos. There's no better way to learn about awesome trucks than with Truck Tunes.

6239.Title: Arthur and the Haunted Tree House
6239.Description: While trick-or-treating, Francine meets an old woman with a very mysterious past, while Binky finds himself at Mr. Ratburn’s amazing haunted house. Muffy and Bailey decide to cut through a dark, rainy cemetery. And as for Arthur, Buster, and Ladonna? Their tree house sleepover seems to be haunted, but by what?

6240.Title: 5K1-States Evidence
6240.Cast: Clifton Powell, Forty Da Great, Melvin Jackson Jr, Quest MCODY, Marwon, Ms Nia, Christina Usher
6240.Description: In Detroit, MI this narrative follows best friends Tiger (rapper Forty Da Great) and Remo (Melvin Jackson, Jr -The Wire/New Edition Story), who the Feds suspects them of running a Criminal Enterprise, Self Made Bosses (SMB). Tiger and Remo tries to figure out their strengths to maintain their reign in the Streets, but the Feds found their weakness and stops at nothing to bring them down.

6241.Title: Mary Poppins
6241.Cast: Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, Glynis Johns, Hermione Baddeley, Karen Dotrice
6241.Description: A magical nanny reconnects a father and mother with their two children.

6242.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
6242.Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Josh Brolin, Mark Ruffalo, Tom Hiddleston, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Jeremy Renner, Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Olsen, Sebastian Stan, Benedict Cumberbatch, Paul Bettany, Cobie Smulders, Benedict Wong, Zoe Saldana, Karen Gillan, Vin Diesel, Dave Bautista, Bradley Cooper, Pom Klementieff, Scarlett Johansson, Benicio Del Toro, Anthony Mackie, Chadwick Boseman, Danai Gurira, Paul Rudd, Don Cheadle, Tom Holland
6242.Description: Superheroes amass to stop intergalactic sociopath Thanos from acquiring a full set of Infinity Stones and wiping out half of all life in the universe.

6243.Title: Soul
6243.Cast: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Angela Bassett, Ahmir-Khalib "Questlove" Thompson, Phylicia Rashad, Daveed Diggs
6243.Description: Jamie Foxx stars in Pixar’s "Soul," a comedy about what makes you... YOU.

6244.Title: The Lion King
6244.Cast: Donald Glover, Seth Rogen, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Alfre Woodard, Billy Eichner, John Kani
6244.Country: United States, United Kingdom, South Africa
6244.Description: Disney’s The Lion King comes to life in a whole new way.

6245.Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
6245.Cast: Sebastian Cabot, Junius Matthews, Barbara Luddy, Howard Morris, John Fiedler, Ralph Wright
6245.Description: Experience the magical tales of Pooh and his Hundred Acre Wood friends.

6246.Title: Toy Story
6246.Cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney, Wallace Shawn, John Ratzenberger
6246.Description: Meet Woody, Buzz and the gang in an adventure full of humor and heart.

6247.Title: Up
6247.Cast: Ed Asner, Christopher Plummer, Jordan Nagai, Bob Peterson, Delroy Lindo, Jerome Ranft
6247.Description: An unlikely pair set to the sky for the adventure of their lives.

6248.Title: Finding Nemo
6248.Cast: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Brad Garrett, Allison Janney
6248.Description: Marlin makes an epic journey to bring Nemo home when he's taken by divers.

6249.Title: Monsters, Inc.
6249.Cast: John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi, James Coburn, Jennifer Tilly
6249.Description: A little girl named Boo wanders into the world of monsters.

6250.Title: Coco
6250.Cast: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach, Renée Victor, Jaime Camil
6250.Description: Miguel journeys to the magical land of his ancestors.

6251.Title: Avatar
6251.Cast: Sam Worthington, Zoë Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Michelle Rodriguez, Giovanni Ribisi
6251.Description: A man embarks on an adventure to an exotic world that he learns to call home & fights to protect.

6252.Title: Toy Story 3
6252.Cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Wallace Shawn, John Ratzenberger
6252.Description: Woody, Buzz and the gang return for more adventures with new friends.

6253.Title: Thor: Ragnarok
6253.Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Idris Elba, Jeff Goldblum, Tessa Thompson, Karl Urban, Mark Ruffalo, Anthony Hopkins, Benedict Cumberbatch, Taika Waititi, Rachel House, Clancy Brown, Tadanobu Asano, Ray Stevenson, Zachary Levi, Luke Hemsworth, Sam Neill
6253.Description: To save Asgard from a bloodthirsty goddess of death, the mighty Thor will have to battle his way to freedom and find a way back home.

6254.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
6254.Cast: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport, Kevin McNally
6254.Description: Jack Sparrow and Will Turner partner to save the governor's daughter.

6255.Title: The Incredibles
6255.Cast: Craig Nelson, Holly Hunter, Samuel Jackson, Jason Lee, Dominique Louis, Teddy Newton
6255.Description: A family of Supers, forced to adopt civilian lives, returns to action.

6256.Title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
6256.Cast: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn, Donnie Yen, Mads Mikkelsen, Alan Tudyk
6256.Description: Unlikely heroes band together to steal the plans to the Death Star.

6257.Title: Zootopia
6257.Cast: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, Jenny Slate, Nate Torrence, Bonnie Hunt
6257.Description: A rookie-cop rabbit and wily fox team up to crack a case.

6258.Title: Ratatouille
6258.Cast: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy, Peter Sohn, Peter O'Toole
6258.Description: A determined young rat dreams of becoming a French chef.

6259.Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
6259.Cast: Hugh Jackman, James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Halle Berry, Nicholas Hoult
6259.Description: Characters from the X-Men trilogy join their younger selves to change the past and save our future.

6260.Title: Black Panther
6260.Cast: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Martin Freeman, Daniel Kaluuya, Letitia Wright, Winston Duke, Sterling K. Brown, Angela Bassett, Forest Whitaker, Andy Serkis, Florence Kasumba, John Kani, David S. Lee, Stan Lee
6260.Description: T'Challa, the superpowered new leader of the hidden, highly advanced African nation of Wakanda, strives to protect his home from enemies old and new.

6261.Title: The Princess Bride
6261.Cast: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Chris Sarandon, Christopher Guest, Wallace Shawn, Andre the Giant
